Being a small unit within a big company enables us to act fast, but with the backup from one of the leading online platforms for fashion and lifestyle in Europe.*
 Over the last years, we learned at Zalando that solving fulfilment related challenges for the good of our merchants helps us to fuel the growth of our platform.
   

  

 Strengthened by this successful growth, we have started the next step in our journey - expanding our business outside of the Zalando ecosystem, exploring both physical and digital services. Zalando launched the ZEOS brand last year (short for Zalando E-commerce Operating System), aiming to build an operating system for the fashion and lifestyle industry that enables brands and retailers to manage their multi-channel business across Europe within one unified platform.
   

  

 As a Principal Product Designer in the ZEOS Design & Research team, you will be responsible for customer-facing digital experiences for our ZEOS Logistics service offerings. Your joint mission is to empower fashion and lifestyle brands to expand their business and increase their profitability across multiple marketplaces and countries throughout Europe through ZEOS.
   

  

 Using your excellent craft skills and seasoned experience, you will design 0 to 1 experiences that empower brands and retailers to steer their multi-channel logistics for their business from our ZEOS digital touchpoints. This is an important role that will help shape the vision for the user experiences for ZEOS, and requires strong foundational UX skills, exceptional stakeholder management, experience in workshop facilitation, and in crafting and evangelising design strategies and visions.
   

  

**WHAT WE’D LOVE YOU TO DO (AND LOVE DOING)**
* You would work with cross-functional teams (product managers, product researchers, fellow designers, & developers) to drive the design vision and strategy for our new multichannel offering that will deliver the best possible experience for both our merchants and their end customers.
* You’ll lead the design of complex customer journeys that cut across multiple pillars, services and teams.
* You’ll help lead stakeholders and team members towards innovative and engaging solutions by conducting design thinking workshops and design sprints that leverage user research.
* You’ll apply strategic thinking to visualise ideas and concepts and communicate them effectively and compellingly for internal stakeholders, partners and customers
* You’ll work to validate and refine concepts with internal and external stakeholders including actual merchants and end users
* You’ll lead by example by producing high-quality work no matter how big or small the task may be.
* You’ll foster design excellence by helping to set the bar for design quality through your own work, and will mentor fellow designers via rituals such as critiques and office hours.


**WE’D LOVE TO MEET YOU IF**
* Experience You are a seasoned design professional with B2B experience that has led the design for complex projects which have delivered valuable end-to-end experiences to your users. You aren’t afraid of ambiguity and you are inspired to dive deep and solve complex and meaningful problems that resonate with customers and their end users. You are adept at bringing various threads together into a unified design strategy that can be understood and executed on by product teams.
* Collaboration You work collaboratively with product managers, engineers, stakeholders and users to understand and define the key problems and desired experiences for solutions, owning the design thread from discovery through delivery.
* Curiosity You are curious about the industry in which you work and the needs of your customers, which allows you to creatively solve their problems.
* Craft You possess expert knowledge in the end-to-end product design process, demonstrating a command of product and design strategy, distillation of problem statements, user needs, journey mapping, wireframing, prototyping, user testing, and the creation of high fidelity visuals. You know how to bring everything together in the form of useful solutions and usable and delightful interactions for our users.
* Experimentation You have a generative approach, strive to solve problems in the best way possible through iteration, leveraging data and insights to drive future iterations and features.
* Delivery You scope and define deliverables and ensure developers have everything they need to build the designed solution. You ensure a remarkable quality of what goes live.
* Empathy You have the mindset and methodologies to understand your customers, colleagues and employees.
* Storytelling You bring not just users but also stakeholders and employees on a journey, enabling them to truly understand the end customer and vision and experience you are setting out to deliver, and the ‘why’ behind your design decisions.


**OUR OFFER**
 Zalando provides a range of benefits, here’s an overview of what you can expect. Ask your Talent Acquisition Partner to learn more about what we offer.
   

  

  

* Employee shares program
* 40% off fashion and beauty products sold and shipped by Zalando, 30% off Zalando Lounge, discounts from external partners
* 2 paid volunteering days a year
* Hybrid working model with 60% (or more) remote per week, actual practice is up to each team to best support their collaboration
* Work from abroad for up to 30 working days a year
* 27 days of vacation a year (for Zalando SE)
* Relocation assistance available (subject to prior agreement)
* Family services, including counseling and support
* Health and wellbeing options (including Gympass)
* Mental health support and coaching available


 Learn all about Zalando and our values here https //jobs.zalando.com/en/?gh\_src=22377bdd1us

title: Packaging Graphic Designer
description:
*"Beauty can be many things to many people. Our job is to inspire people to be themselves."* 
 Ben Gorham, Founder of Byredo.
 



  





 The European luxury brand BYREDO was founded in Stockholm in 2006, with an ambition to translate memories and emotions into products and experiences.
 



  





 BYREDO creates and develops a range of products such as fragrance and make-up but also ByProduct, the brand category for any non-beauty projects.
 



 BYREDO is reinventing the world of luxury through a new approach, where creation is led by emotions, expressing a full and limitless brand universe.
 



 BYREDO is sold in more than 40 countries in a very high-end exclusive network worldwide, with a growing presence online and a strong focus on Ecommerce activities.
 



  





 We believe that through creativity, we’re able to develop timeless products, both meaningful and inspirational, to people and their lives.
 



 We believe that only great people can design & bring those beautiful projects to life.
 



 We believe on talents vs profiles, on experience vs education, on diversity vs boundaries.
 



 We believe that only powerful teams can lead together the growth of the company, and therefore, we are highly committed to our people.
 



  





 At BYREDO we come as we are, with the intention to learn from each other and go beyond business objectives.
 



  





**ABOUT THE JOB** 




 At BYREDO, we are dedicated to creating exceptional branding and marketing experiences that reflect our luxury ethos. We are seeking a talented Graphic Designer specializing in luxury packaging to join our creative team to elevate our visual identity through exquisite packaging solutions. This position is a temporary substitution for study leave, lasting just under two (2) years.
 



  





 As a Graphic Designer for luxury packaging, you will be responsible for designing and delivering high-quality artworks that embody the elegance and sophistication of the BYREDO brand. With a keen eye for detail, you make sure that the brand DNA and our high design standards are always kept. Your exceptional artworking skills, keen eye for detail, and mastery of typography will ensure that every packaging project meets the highest standards of luxury and functionality.
 



  





 You will collaborate closely with our creative team and product development team to create innovative packaging concepts, oversee the production process, and adapt designs for various formats.
 



  





**Your key responsibilities will include but not be limited to:** 



* Collaborate with the graphic design team to conceptualize and deliver outstanding luxury packaging for our product launches and marketing campaigns.
* Create visually stunning and highly refined packaging designs that resonate with our audience and enhance the BYREDO brand.
* Ensure consistency in the look and feel of all BYREDO packaging, aligning with our brand values and aesthetics.
* Conduct thorough research to inspire and inform creative projects, keeping abreast of trends in luxury packaging design.
* Manage the delivery of all artworks, ensuring they are print/production-ready and meet stringent quality control standards.
* Extensive knowledge of diverse paper /material qualities and types as well as printing techniques
* Build and maintain relationships with printers and vendors to ensure seamless production and high-quality outcomes.



  





**ABOUT YOU** 




 You are passionate about graphic design with a particular focus on packaging and art working. You possess a creative and meticulous mindset, capable of translating concepts into beautiful, functional designs. Your enthusiasm for the luxury market and understanding of the BYREDO brand will drive your work, and you are eager to stay ahead of trends and innovations in design.
 



  





**Other desired qualifications and soft skills:** 



* Bachelor’s degree (or equivalent experience) in graphic design, visual communication, or a related field.
* Extensive experience in graphic design, particularly in luxury packaging, with a strong portfolio showcasing your work.
* Proficient in Adobe Creative Suite, with a focus on Illustrator, Photoshop and InDesign.
* Excellent typography skills and knowledge of color theory and visual storytelling.
* Strong interest and knowledge of art, fashion, and luxury branding.
* Excellent communication skills in written and spoken English.
* A proactive interest in the latest design technologies and trends.



  





 Apply today! Please submit your portfolio and resume together as a single PDF file in English. We review applications on a rolling basis, so the position may be filled before the application deadline if we find the right candidate.
 



  





 We look forward to receiving your application!

title: User Experience Researcher (Bangkok-based, Relocation provided)
description:
**About Agoda**
 Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with a global network of 4.7M hotels and holiday properties worldwide, plus flights, activities, and more . Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 7,100+ employees representing 95+ nationalities in 27 markets foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.
   

  

**Our Purpose –** 
**Bridging the World Through Travel**
 We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.
   

  

 We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.
   

  

**We have only scratched the surface.** 
 The online travel industry is an extremely dynamic and competitive space. Our aim is to deliver compelling designs that create a world-class customer experience. You will have a key role in defining the future of our products that reach millions of customers. Despite our size, we operate in a startup-like environment.
   

  

**Work in the heart of Asia.** 
 This is an amazing opportunity if you’re looking for an exciting adventure abroad while expanding your international research capabilities. You get a chance to live in one of the most beautiful and most visited cities in the world!
   

  

**This position is open to worldwide candidates and we will assist you with a generous relocation package, ensuring a smooth transition to working and living in Bangkok.**
**Get to Know our Team:**
 Agoda Product Team is a diverse group of UX researchers, product designers and product managers that help to build Agoda’s products from our home office in Bangkok. Being a product-driven company, our UX researchers and designers constantly partner with product managers and engineers to understand hotel partners’ problems and design workflows, interactions, and visual interfaces. The opportunity and timing are now if you wish to come into a team that’s small enough to be scrappy and hands on, yet big enough to influence change and product strategy. Be a part of Agoda’s Enterprise Product Team and unlock the world for our global community of hotels and travelers.
   

  

**Qualifications:**
* Bachelor/Master in Computer Science, Human Computer Interaction, Information Science, Psychology, Social Science, or any related field
* 3:6 years of relevant experience in consumer-facing business domains
* You are very comfortable with planning, scoping, conducting, analyzing and communicating research
* Experience with qualitative and user-centered design methods (individual and group interviews, diary studies, direct observation, think-aloud usability testing, etc.)
* Experience with quantitative research (metrics, survey design, response effects, sampling, crosstabs, and statistical concepts, etc.)
* Experience in evaluating, negotiating, and working with external research vendors
* Be able to describe user problems and business opportunities to a variety of stakeholders by leveraging both quantitative and qualitative data
* You are able to demonstrate critical thinking beyond business requests
* You are a great storyteller and communicator, able to speak fluently to business people, designers, engineers and other stakeholders (in English)
* You enjoy collaborative work in a dynamic, data-driven and creative environment


**Responsibilities:**
 You will own end-to-end planning, execution, analysis and reporting of research projects, and you will need to consistently achieve research outputs needed by the design team and product team for their pursuits and occasionally inform strategic decisions in Product approach or business domain direction:
   

  

* Collaborating with UX designers and product managers to understand research needs, and work cross-functionally with multiple stakeholders including data scientists, engineering and partner service managers to probe deeper insights
* Defining research questions and selecting appropriate methods of data collection to deliver stakeholder-relevant value at any stage of business.
* Developing budgets and timelines for research projects
* Shows good judgment when evaluating research opportunities, e.g. determines the importance, urgency, and impact for team
* Develops research activities and insights to answer key business questions effectively and efficiently.
* Recruiting participants for research studies
* Conducting design research studies and analyzing the data collected, generate insights that influence how product teams think about medium and long-term product strategy
* Manage through ambiguity, work autonomously, and multitask in a fast paced environment
* Adopts and adapts well-established methods according to product/project situations, and innovates new methods that scale.
* Collaborate with other insights functions to ensure scope of work is informed by previous learnings, and elevate insights to additional depths.
* Work with data team to query and synthesis out insights that support designers’ or product managers’ hypothesis
* Reasonably challenges details of inbound research requests, and proposes solid research solutions.
* Lead end-to-end research activities – including driving research objectives, hypotheses, methodology, execution, analysis, and communication.


 #seattle #sanfrancisco #beijing #newyork #london #bangkok #singapore #chicago #hongkong #singapore #berlin #shanghai #losangeles #boston #austin #toronto #luxembourg #munich #oslo #copenhagen #stockholm #helsinki #brussels #hamburg #stuttgart #taipei #hamburg #stuttgart #dublin #telaviv #sydney #melbourne #perth #vancouver #montreal #prague #paris #dublin #telaviv #milan #rome #tokyo #osaka #amsterdam #azerbaijan #armenia #belarus #kazakhstan #kyrgyzstan #moldova #russia #tajikistan #turkmenistan #uzbekistan #ukraine
   

  

**Equal Opportunity Employer**
 At Agoda, we pride ourselves on being a company represented by people of all different backgrounds and orientations. We prioritize attracting diverse talent and cultivating an inclusive environment that encourages collaboration and innovation. Employment at Agoda is based solely on a person’s merit and qualifications. We are committed to providing equal employment opportunity regardless of sex, age, race, color, national origin, religion, marital status, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, citizenship, veteran or military status, and other legally protected characteristics.
   

  

 We will keep your application on file so that we can consider you for future vacancies and you can always ask to have your details removed from the file. For more details please read our privacy policy .
   

  

 To all recruitment agencies: Agoda does not accept third party resumes. Please do not send resumes to our jobs alias, Agoda employees or any other organization location. Agoda is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes.

title: Product Owner with Salesforce Marketing Cloud Experience
description:
**Now you can join our customer in Shaping the Future of Aviation ✈️**
 Since 1946, we’ve connected Scandinavia to the world, but the future is evolving, and we need to stay ahead of the curve. We are embarking on the largest digital and IT transformation in history—employing 100 new talents in areas like data science, UX design, and development. This team will lead the way into the future of aviation, driving innovation far beyond industry standards.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As a
 **Salesforce Marketing Cloud Product Owner** 
 , you’ll be at the core of our personalized customer journey initiatives, helping travelers navigate life and travel events seamlessly. You will drive the strategy, roadmap, and backlog prioritization for the Salesforce platform, collaborating closely with marketing teams to support their journey-building processes.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities:**
* Lead product intake, prioritize backlogs, and define the strategy for the Salesforce Marketing Cloud platform
* Collaborate with stakeholders to maximize product value and manage dependencies
* Work with agile teams to create development-ready stories and facilitate workshops
* Proactively collaborate with other product owners to ensure smooth feature rollouts and successful go-lives


**About You:** 
 You’re passionate about digital marketing and have hands-on experience with Salesforce Marketing Cloud. You’re a collaborative leader with a deep understanding of product ownership and agile methodologies.
   

  

**What You’ll Need:**
* Experience in Salesforce Marketing Cloud development
* Proven product ownership experience
* Familiarity with agile frameworks


**Why Work With Us?**
* Purposeful: Join a historic transformation in aviation, solving challenges no one has tackled before
* Flexible: Whether you prefer the office, home, or anywhere in Scandinavia, flexibility is key
* Adventurous: Enjoy discounted airline tickets for you, family, and friends, making the world smaller
* Innovative: Drive in-house product development with the freedom to implement your ideas
* Ownership: See your initiatives through from concept to delivery


 Be part of a fast-paced, collaborative, and innovative environment that values your ideas and offers you the opportunity to grow. Ready to make a real impact? Apply now!
   

  

**About The Assignment, We Prefer Project Employment**
 For this assignment, you will be hired as a consultant by HIROY. We offer our consultants a generous package, and you will also become a part of our extensive network of agencies. This will provide you with the opportunity to deploy your skills and interact with our network of consultants.
   

  

 We often offer on an ongoing basis. This means that we sometimes remove the assignment from our website earlier than the application deadline. If you are interested in an assignment, we recommend that you apply immediately.
   

  

 Period: Contract: 17-Nov-2024 - 17-Nov-2025 until further notice
   

  

 Hybrid Model 100%
   

  

 Stockholm

title: Senior Marketing Automation & CRM Consultant - Stockholm
description:
📢
 **Don't miss out on this opportunity! Be sure to submit your application before October 6th!**
 Columbia Road Stockholm is now looking for a Marketing Automation and CRM Consultant. You'll be working on planning and executing successful marketing automation initiatives, be it implementing new system capabilities or running daily operations (lead generation, nurturing, lead scoring, loyalty programs or customer journey orchestration). You'll be joining a team of top digital sales professionals who will make you feel welcome from day one. We look forward to hearing from you, future Roadie!
   

  

**About Columbia Road**
 Columbia Road builds and operates seamless and commercially effective customer journeys. We help our clients sell better by getting more customers and revenue but also by improving existing experiences. Our tight-knit team consist of business-minded consultants who leverage technology to generate impact. Our main competence areas are:
   

  

**Marketing Technology** 
 (Upper funnel - bottom funnel & Data)
 **- This role**
**Software Development** 
 (Build new or improve existing channels)
   

  

**Design** 
 (Customer insights, UI/UX, and process improvement)
   

  

 You will join our team of 29 talented individuals in Stockholm with ambitious growth targets for the future. Columbia Road group however, is much larger, with 3 offices, over 150 exceptionally talented people representing over 25 nationalities and the official language being English. Our company spirit is one of a true start-up with a twist of hard-core experience. Instead of line managers and red tape, we believe in giving a lot of responsibility and freedom to our employees. Diversity, equity, and inclusion are at the heart of our essence and everyone at Columbia Road is committed to these values.
   

  

 Columbia Road's focus on digital sales means we are tackling many types of projects - some of the main platforms we actively work on are Adobe, HubSpot, Salesforce, Shopify and Dynamics, but we also support our clients outside of these platforms.
   

  

 At Columbia Road, we approach projects from a business perspective, choosing the tech that best suits our clients' needs, which means we need to stay up to date with market trends and new technologies on the rise. Depending on your career goals, you can continue deepening your skillset within a set of platforms or become a general digital sales expert. We believe in learning by doing and doing should be done with great support from your colleagues; the more experience you have, the more you'll be able to take responsibility for your client projects and help other Roadies grow.
   

  

 For more details on projects, see our reference cases HERE or check out our blog HERE. Find out more about working with us by visiting our careers page or taking a look at our Culture Code.
   

  

 Columbia Road is a part of the Futurice family of companies.
   

  

**Job Description**
 We believe that marketing and sales should be a joint effort - marketing is not an add-on, it's at the core of digital sales. Digital marketers should be working right there with the team generating business impact. We're committed to making a change in our field.
   

  

 We're building a team of dedicated people to drive this change. We are looking for lead generation & marketing automation consultants who have an innovative mindset towards generating growth. You will have an important role in helping our customers grow their businesses.
   

  

 As a marketing automation consultant you are used to planning and executing successful lead acquisition and nurturing campaigns. You are able to derive business insights from complex data and you are endlessly driving to improve customer experience at all stages of the customer journey beginning from brand awareness and ending at a successful purchase.
   

  

 We expect you to have hands-on experience from several different marketing automation tools and to have an understanding of customer journeys and care models. You are familiar with customer data analytics operations and are able to derive business insights from complex data.
   

  

 By nature, you are analytical and like to solve problems. You are able to bring clarity to uncertain and chaotic situations. You are ambitious and results-oriented in everything you do, but you like to have fun as well.
   

  

 In order to be successful in this role, you should have full working proficiency in the Swedish language as well as excellent written and oral skills in English.
   

  

**Requirements**
 Skills and experience we expect you to have:
   

  

* Project management: experience in leading projects or leading initiatives
* Languages: Fluent Swedish and English
* Hands-on experience in:
+ Marketing Automation platforms (e.g. Salesforce, Hubspot, , Marketo, CustomerIO or equivalent)
+ CRM tools (e.g. Salesforce, HubSpot, Pipedrive, MS Dynamics)
+ Experience in utilising customer data from various sources (CRM, CDP, DMP)

* Analytical mindset, ability to see outside the box
* Digital advertising understanding (e.g. Google Ads, Facebook Ads Manager, LinkedIn, Instagram)
* Knowledge of web technologies and content management systems


 Make sure you showcase your experience and knowledge as clearly as possible in your application, resume and attachments. We value examples and results from previous projects, and we'd love to know what concrete marketing tools you used to get to those results.
   

  

**Recruitment process**
 The recruitment process usually has 2-3 steps during which we get to know who you are and what motivates you. You will learn more about Columbia Road and get to meet different people from our company. You'll have the opportunity to present highlights from your career and tell us about your skills, roles, and learnings.
   

  

 We're committed to creating a good match between you and our organisation, and want to spend time to get it right.
   

  

 When we're done with the face-to-face discussions, we'll contact the people you have chosen as references. Applications will be reviewed ongoing with a deadline for application submission on October 6th.
   

  

 We hope to hear from you soon!
   

  

**Benefits**
* Best people to work with and learn from in a flat, zero-hierarchy organisation
* Meaningful ways of working and the possibility to influence them
* Tools to balance your work with the rest of your life in the best possible way
* Competitive salary
* Additional pension (7% of monthly salary for full-time employees)
* Wellness benefit
* Pick the laptop and phone of your choosing
* Recurring training & learning sessions
* Company excursion trips: we have been to Tallinn, Berlin, London, Mariehamn and Riga
* Daily breakfasts & healthy refreshments and a active fun-squad to ensure fun activities happens regularly
* Compensation for working on open source or social programs in your free time


 NOTE: We are currently not able to offer visa sponsorships for Sweden, so unfortunately we can't take applications from outside EU/EEA forward.

title: Engineering Manager - Customer Experience
description:
*Tink was founded in 2012, and a decade later became part of Visa in 2022. Tink was created with the aim of changing the banking industry for the better. We have built Europe’s most robust open banking platform – with the broadest, deepest connectivity and powerful services that create value out of the financial data. We offer the tools that allow anyone – from big banks and fintechs to startups – to build the future of financial services across Europe.*
 The Customer Experience team at Tink has a clear mission: to deliver world-class product experiences to its customers.
   

  

 We provide powerful solutions to developers and their consumers. By solving the right problem, crafting a scalable solution, and providing great experiences, we make the Tink platform easy to use, quick to onboard, and we ensure reliable outcomes for the end-user. That is why front-end development and UX design are core to us at Customer Experience.
   

  

 The Customer Experience area at Tink is unique with its set up of front-end and full-stack teams. With this, you will have the opportunity to not only develop the people and products we own but also how Tink as a whole work with frontend development and UX. We believe that there are a lot of things to be done and an opportunity for someone to grow within their role.
   

  

**What You Will Do**
 Even though we have a broad mandate, there are some parts of the Tink experience we are especially passionate about. See more of the work we do and a few use cases here.
   

  

 We use React, TypeScript, Golang, MySQL, node.js and all our microservices run on Kubernetes in AWS. We regularly deploy to production and assure quality by automated tests and monitoring. The team is responsible for the availability of the services it owns, has SLOs/SLIs in place as well as an on-call rotation.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Drive technical development and provide leadership in an innovative and fast-paced environment
* Build high performing teams to support a cross-functional team composed of backend and frontend engineers
* Work closely with product manager and designers to ensure we're building products in the best way
* Enable the team to reach their targets by removing impediments, clarifying goals and initiatives, and fostering ownership and accountability
* Facilitate a culture of learning, trust, responsibility, and friendliness
* Be responsible for the overall planning, execution and deliver on agreed timelines
* Make sure the team has the talent it needs to succeed long-term by hiring great people


****What we offer** 
 you**
 Tink offers you a dynamic work environment where you can grow and develop your skills, with opportunities for career advancement. You will have the chance to lead and shape the future of our engineering teams and be part of a mission to deliver innovative and high-quality services to our customers. You will receive comprehensive support and resources to guide your engineering teams through transformations, ensuring you have everything needed when leading through change and contributing to our mission.
   

  

**What We Look For**
 We are looking for an Engineering Manager who has a business-oriented mindset, understands how projects and delivery influences business growth and sees the link between engineering and product development. Someone who is great at managing change and changing priorities.
   

  

* Experience from an Engineering Manager position, leading a cross-functional engineering team.
* Experience from frontend and backend engineering, we use node.js for our backend services
* A track record of operational excellence and have led a change initiative, for example taking a project or team from A to B.
* Solid experience from working in an agile development environment, preferably from a fintech/payments industry.
* Strong organizational and prioritization skills along with outstanding written and verbal communication skills.


 This is a hybrid position. Hybrid employees can alternate time between both remote and office. Employees in hybrid roles are expected to work from the office 2-3 days a week (determined by leadership/site), with a general guidepost of being in the office 50% or more of the time based on business needs.
   

  

*Who we are at Tink*
*We are a company of developers and engineers – it’s in our DNA to imagine, build and iterate. We were founded with a vision of transforming an industry that lacked competition and momentum. And we have built a company of passionate over-achievers who all believe there is always a better way of doing things.*
*People from all over Europe – and the world – have joined us on our mission to build the biggest and best open banking platform in Europe.*
*We're looking forward to your application!*
 Tink was founded in 2012, and a decade later became part of Visa in 2022. Tink was created with the aim of changing the banking industry for the better. We have built Europe’s most robust open banking platform – with the broadest, deepest connectivity and powerful services that create value out of the financial data. We offer the tools that allow anyone – from big banks and fintechs to startups – to build the future of financial services across Europe.
   

  

 Tink’s 500+ employees serve more than 300 banks and fintechs in 18 European markets, out of offices in 13 countries. We power the new world of finance. For more information, visit tink.com.

title: Fullstack Developer
description:
We are Happy Socks, an innovative fashion company that specializes in designing and producing unique, high-quality fashion items. We sell directly to consumers through our online and physical channels, as well as wholesale to a range of partners. Our tech team is at the core of our digital innovation and development, driving initiatives that enhance the customer experience, optimize internal processes, and improve the efficiency of our supply chain. We value creativity, collaboration, and a forward-thinking approach to problem-solving.
   

  

**Role Overview**
 As a Fullstack Engineer, you will be responsible for developing both the front-end and back-end components of our applications. And when we say back-end we truly mean the back-end. You will work closely with designers, our product manager, and other engineers to build new features, improve user experience, and ensure scalability and performance. Our tech team takes a proactive approach, identifying opportunities for improvement and taking initiative without waiting for specific assignments. We are looking for a candidate that will strive to fit into that culture.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Design and implement user interfaces using HTML, CSS, and TypeScript, ensuring an engaging and consistent user experience.
* Work with designers to create responsive and accessible UI/UX, ensuring a seamless experience across devices.
* Develop and maintain internal and external web applications.
* Design and implement APIs and integrate with both internal and external third-party services.
* Work with micro-services, queues, and message buses to ensure scalable and resilient architecture.
* Optimize applications for performance, scalability, security, as well as operational resilience.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand requirements and deliver features that align with the business goals.
* Be proactive in identifying potential issues and resolving them before they become problems, ensuring smooth operation and minimizing disruptions.
* Participate in code reviews to maintain high code quality.
* Troubleshoot, debug, and resolve issues as they arise.


**Requirements** 
  

  

- Experience: 3-5 years of experience as a fullstack developer.

- Technical Skills:

* Front-end: A fullstack web framework like Nuxt3, but Next.js or Remix would work as well, TypeScript, Headless CMS (Storyblok is a plus)
* Back-end: Node.js, Serverless Lambdas, Microservices, SQS, API integration
* Cloud Platforms: AWS, Vercel
* Architecture: Experience working with micro-services, queues, and message buses
* HTML & CSS: Proficiency in HTML5, CSS3, and modern UI/UX development techniques, including responsive and adaptive design.
* Database Knowledge: Experience with both relational databases (e.g. MySQL or MariaDB) and document databases (e.g. DynamoDB).
* Version Control: Experience with Git and collaborative development workflows.
* Problem Solving: Strong problem-solving skills and a proactive attitude towards challenges. Know when to push on with your own research, but also when to reach out. And help out your colleagues by writing relevant documentation.
* E-commerce Experience: Experience working in an e-commerce environment, systems managing carts, orders, payment solutions et c.
* Attention to detail: Ensure that all built functionality works reliably across various scenarios, proactively addressing potential edge cases to prevent unexpected issues.


**Nice To Have**
* Experience with Azure or GCP, and familiarity with CI/CD pipelines.
* Experience with web accessibility best practices, ensuring inclusive and accessible user experiences.


 But most importantly, you have the personality to fit a somewhat crazy, fun work environment where we believe in color and playfulness, a place where you can expect the unexpected and you are a source of creative weirdness.
   

  

**Why Join Us?**
 Are you someone who thrives in collaborative environments, where teamwork is key and innovation is encouraged? Do you want to be part of a smaller development team and work close to the business? Here you will play a pivotal role in ensuring our site is up to date and ensuring a seamless user experience. -
 **If this sounds like you, get in touch!**
 So if you're ready to join a diverse and inclusive team where your personality and skills are valued, we want to hear from you! Apply now and let's get you on board ASAP.
   

  

*At Happy Socks, we're all about diversity, so people of all genders, ages, and backgrounds are encouraged to apply.*
 Happy Socks aims to spread happiness by turning an everyday essential into a colorful design piece. The business is built on foundations of rigid quality standards, craftsmanship and creativity that are transferred into the products by a talented team of creatives. The products feature endless variations of models and designs, using a broad spectrum of color combinations and original patterns.

title: Fullstack Developer
description:
Dedicated to powering entrepreneurs, Qred Bank is a profitable, fast-growing fintech scale-up. Ranked by Financial Times as one the fastest growing companies in the EU for four consecutive years. We are a well-capitalized, founder-led company, characterized by fast decisions and a flat organization. With our team on the cusp of surpassing 200 Qredsters, we are now looking for a Fullstack Developer to be a part of the next chapter in our growth journey as Sweden's newest bank!
 



  





**Ok, sounds cool but what about the role?** 




 As a Fullstack developer at Qred, you’ll be a part of a cross-functional team together with other Qredsters with different tech competencies. We have a few things in mind when we build our teams, but in general, we put together developers with UX designers, to be able to efficiently do our daily work and create a feeling of ownership for our products. Every team is human-sized and well-structured, being led by an Engineering Manager, Product Manager, and a Tech Lead, to ensure everyone is included, heard, aligned, and moving in the same direction.
 



 We also believe in the trust in our developer’s capability of implementing, testing, reviewing, deploying daily, and operating their software in production.
 



  





  





**Sounds like a good way of working right? Here’s what we're looking for:** 




  





 A flexible and positive mindset as well as a strong team spirit
 



  





 Around 2-4 years of experience in writing, releasing and maintaining web applications as well as integrations, using the following techs:
 


* Node.js
* React
* Amazon Web Services



  





 If you have the following experience you’ll definitely stick out from the crowd:
 


* Experience working with Agile methodologies
* CloudFormation or CDK
* CI/CD tool such as circle-ci, github actions or similar
* Experience with the fintech industry



  





**Did you check in those boxes? Here are more reasons to join us** 




 First of all, this is the place to be if you’re looking for a place to grow. Qred is growing fast, and our Qredsters along with it. Our non-bureaucratic, flat organization with delegated responsibilities has a short way from idea to action.
 



  





 In addition to our great culture influenced by our values Transparency, Innovation and Passion, you get to work with the latest cutting-edge techniques offered by AWS, responsibility for the whole development chain, and last but not least a bunch of new competent colleagues to learn from and get to know!
 



  





**One last thing - if you’re about to send in your application** 




 This is a full-time, permanent position based in our headquarters in Stockholm. Don’t wait to send in your application! We're reviewing applications on a rolling basis and while the start date is flexible, the right candidate can join us immediately.
 



  





*Qred celebrates diversity and does not discriminate based on ethnicity, religion, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, disability status, or any other applicable characteristics protected by law.*

title: Uppdragsledare inom mjukvaruutveckling
description:
Arbetsplatsbeskrivning
   

  

*Är du redo för en större uppgift?*
*Inom polisen står vi inför en spännande tid med digitalisering, ny teknik och många viktiga utvecklingsuppdrag. Vi söker nu en uppdragsledare som kan bidra till effektivisering av Polismyndigheten genom ökad digitalisering av vår ärendehantering.*
 Som anställd på IT-avdelningen är du delaktig i ett viktigt samhällsuppdrag med många spännande verksamhetsområden och en möjlighet att göra skillnad på riktigt. Hos oss kommer du tillsammans med engagerade och trevliga kollegor utvecklas och få erfarenheter för livet, samtidigt som ditt arbete bidrar till att öka tryggheten och minska brottsligheten i Sverige.
   

  

 Polisens IT-avdelning har cirka 1300 anställda och ansvarar för all IT som används av myndighetens 40 000 medarbetare.
   

  

 Vi har vår arbetsplats på Kungsholmen i Stockholm och det finns möjlighet att arbeta hemifrån upp till två dagar i veckan. Som statligt anställd på Polismyndigheten erbjuder vi även särskilda förmåner kring pension, föräldralön, friskvård m.m.
   

  

 Läs mer om våra förmåner och villkor här.
   

  

 Arbetsbeskrivning
   

  

 Sveriges största myndighet hanterar ett mycket stort antal processer för intern utrustning och ärendehantering, och i detta utvecklingsteam jobbar vi för att ta fram digitala lösningar som är effektiva för hela verksamheten.
   

  

 Som uppdragsledare kommer du tillsammans med övriga i gruppen att utveckla, förvalta och underhålla våra nya och befintliga system.
   

  

 Våra applikationer är egenutvecklade men baseras på en standardplattform från extern leverantör. Vi ansvarar för dessa under hela livscykeln, från nyutveckling, förvaltning till avveckling. Vi är ett självorganiserande team, där du erbjuds stora möjligheter att påverka vår arbetsvardag samt val av arbetssätt.
   

  

 Som uppdragsledare har du användarna och applikationerna i fokus, vilket du får genom att t ex:
   

  

* Ta emot och bearbeta verksamhetens behov av utveckling
* Vara med och prioritera, planera, utveckla och genomföra ny och vidareutvecklingsaktiviteter
* Se till att vi har en löpande teknisk förvaltning av våra applikationer


 Kvalifikationer
   

  

*Vi söker dig som har:*
* Relevant akademisk utbildning, företrädesvis inom IT-området, alternativt att du har motsvarande förvärvad erfarenhet som Polismyndigheten bedömer som likvärdig
* Minst tre års aktuell och relevant erfarenhet av att samordna och strukturera uppdrag i en komplex IT-miljö, företrädesvis i en roll som teknisk uppdragsledare, IT-projektledare, produktägare eller liknande
* Erfarenhet inom UX-design
* God kompetens kring agil systemutvecklingsmetodik
* Mycket goda förmåga att uttrycka dig på svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift


 Anställningen kräver svenskt medborgarskap.
   

  

*Erfarenheter och/eller kunskaper kring något eller några av följande områden är meriterande:*
* Ärendehanteringssystem som t.ex. BMC Helix (Remedy), Jira, Service Now, Siebel
* ITSM
* Linux
* Kubernetes
* Förvaltning av applikationer och miljöer / livscykelhantering


**Personliga egenskaper:**
 Vi söker dig som är tekniskt intresserad, nyfiken, och prestigelös. Som person är du ansvarstagande, flexibel och gillar att hitta lösningar på verksamhetensbehov. Vidare är du en kommunikativ lagspelare som tycker om att dela med dig av dina kunskaper.
   

  

 Vi kommer att lägga stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper.
   

  

 Kontaktpersoner
   

  

 Har du frågor om uppdraget är du välkommen att ta kontakt via 010-5672052
   

  

 Fackliga företrädare
   

  

 Polisförbundet, Sofia Ask, tfn: 010-563 87 10
   

  

 SACO, nås via mejl saco-s.avdelningarna@polisen.se
   

  

 SEKO Polisen, Karna Tillheden, tfn: 010-561 66 27
   

  

 ST, Tom Johnsson 076-947 00 30
   

  

 Övrig information
   

  

 Anställningsform: Tillsvidareanställning som inleds med provanställning om 6 månader
   

  

 Arbetsort: Stockholm
   

  

 Arbetstid: Dagtid
   

  

 Tillträde: Enligt överenskommelse
   

  

 Funktion: Uppdragsledare
   

  

**Ansök genom att bifoga ditt CV (vi vill inte ha något personligt brev) på svenska och besvara urvalsfrågorna (enkät).** 
 Frågorna utgår från kravprofilen för den här rekryteringen och dina svar ligger till grund för det urval som sker i processen. Att besvara frågorna är en förutsättning för att din ansökan ska anses komplett.
   

  

 Vänligen notera att krav och eventuella meriter ska vara uppfyllda vid ansökningstillfället.
   

  

 De uppgifter du lämnar i samband med din ansökan kan användas för att kontakta dig, få information och kallelser samt eventuella anställningshandlingar.
   

  

**Välkommen med din ansökan i form av CV och enkät (pdf, 275 kB) via e-post till jobb.na@polisen.se senast den 20 november 2024.** 
 Ansökningar till denna befattning kommer endast tas emot via den mailadress som anges i annonsen.
 **Märk din ansökan med referensnummer A642.118/2024 i mailets ärendemening.**
 Har du skyddade personuppgifter, referenser eller liknande information som du själv bedömer som skyddsvärd rekommenderar vi att du kontaktar ansvarig HR-konsult innan du går vidare med din ansökan.
   

  

 En anställning hos Polismyndigheten kan komma att inledas med en provanställning om sex månader.
   

  

 Vi ställer höga krav på våra medarbetares säkerhets- och sekretessmedvetenhet. Säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585) genomförs innan beslut om anställning fattas. Med anställning följer en skyldighet att krigsplaceras. Läs mer om krigsplacering och säkerhetsprövning.
   

  

 Polismyndigheten kommer att behandla dina personuppgifter i enlighet med reglerna i EU:s dataskyddsförordning (2016/679) och annan tillämplig dataskyddsreglering. Läs mer om vår hantering av personuppgifter här.
   

  

 Din ansökan är en offentlig handling enligt offentlighetsprincipen.
   

  

*Polismyndigheten*
*Polismyndigheten erbjuder dig en arbetsplats som stimulerar till mångfald, kreativitet och personlig utveckling.*
*Vi bedriver vår verksamhet enligt vår värdegrund: engagemang, effektivitet och tillgänglighet. Som medarbetare inom polisen agerar du för likabehandling. Det är en förutsättning för rättssäkerhet, rättstrygghet och för polisens legitimitet i samhället. Som företrädare för polisen respekterar du allas lika värde och skapar förtroende för polisen.*
*Läs gärna mer om polisen och vår verksamhet.*
***Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!***

title: IT-tekniker med fokus på vård – Stockholm
description:
Har du ett genuint intresse för IT och vill vara en viktig del av en supportorganisation inom vårdsektorn? Är du nyfiken, social och drivs av att hjälpa andra? Vi söker nu en engagerad **IT-tekniker** som vill vara med och stötta vår kunds vårdenheter runtom i Stockholm!

#### **Om rollen**


I rollen som IT-tekniker kommer du att arbeta med installation, support och felsökning av IT-utrustning för att stötta vår kunds vårdenheter i Stockholm. Du blir en nyckelperson i supportteamet och en viktig kontakt för användarna. Rollen innebär daglig kontakt med användare via telefon, e-post och fjärrstyrningsverktyg, men även fysiska besök på vårdenheterna för att säkerställa hög servicenivå och tillgänglighet.

#### **Dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter:**

* **Installation, support och felsökning** av IT-utrustning, inklusive datorer, skrivare, scanners, medicinteknisk utrustning, telefoner och nätverksutrustning.
* **Användaradministration** och hantering av ärenden i vårt ärendehanteringssystem.
* Nära samarbete med den centrala IT-driftavdelningen för att lösa problem och upprätthålla hög tillgänglighet.
* Aktivt bidra till att utveckla och kvalitetssäkra IT-support och förbättra våra supportprocesser.
* Delta i centrala **IT-projekt** och **utrullningar/migreringar**

#### **Är det här du?**


Vi söker dig som brinner för att hjälpa andra och är lösningsorienterad. Du är självgående, ansvarstagande och strukturerad i ditt arbete. För att trivas i rollen ser vi att du har:

* Eftergymnasial utbildning inom IT eller motsvarande erfarenhet.
* Minst tre års erfarenhet inom IT-support, inklusive både 1st och 2nd line.
* Mycket goda kunskaper i Office 365, Microsoft Teams, OneDrive, Exchange och Active Directory.
* Erfarenhet av arbete i en reglerad miljö och installation av applikationer och anslutna enheter.
* Goda kunskaper om datorer, kringutrustning, operativsystem (särskilt Windows 10) och grundläggande nätverkskunskaper (TCP/IP) inklusive switchar och routing.
* **Körkort** är ett krav då rollen innefattar besök på vårdenheter runtom i Stockholm.

**Ansökan**

  

Vårt Talent Acquisition-team ser gärna att du som söker har goda referenser samt ett välarbetat CV som specificerar tidigare erfarenheter och utbildning inom området. Visa gärna ditt intresse så snart som möjligt, då vi intervjuar löpande. Vi välkomnar sökande med olika bakgrunder och erfarenheter, eftersom vi vet att mångfald berikar och stärker vårt arbete. Vi tar endast emot ansökningar via vårt system. Vid frågor, kontakta maria@linden-it.se.

title: Strategic Purchaser IT
description:
*Saab is a place where teamwork makes things fly. Literally. Join us and experience our supportive and friendly workplace.*

  

Your role


You will be responsible for managing selected IT sourcing categories as well as executing a wide range of sourcing projects and activities, mainly within the category but also in other IT related categories.

  

Your primary focus will be in Cloud, SaaS solutions.  

In your role you will also be responsible for, supplier relationship management and contracts. You will be part of a small team of procurement professionals with an atmosphere of openness, knowledge sharing and a solution-oriented approach.


You will report to the Head of IS/IT Procurement within the central Group Procurement function.

  

The main tasks are:

* Set, develop and execute category strategies
* Perform and lead sourcing projects and activities
* Lead collaboration and communication with cross functional teams globally, interact with relevant stakeholders
* Responsible for Supplier relationships commercially
* Supplier Governance and Contracts
* Deliver value and performance improvements, compliance and cost reduction


Participate in Saab Procurement’s exciting journey to drive Operational Excellence and becoming a world leading purchasing organization. During 2021, we started a Procurement excellence program that will run over the next coming years to develop Saab into a world leading Purchasing organization.


Travels will occur in this role.


Your profile


We are looking for a commercially focused and business driven Category Manager / Strategic Purchaser, that have hands-on experience in executing and delivering results, who enjoys leading sourcing activities and interacting with stakeholders and suppliers. To fit this role, you need to have excellent communication and negotiation skills and manages contracts and relationships with suppliers autonomously. Additionally, we value qualities like openness, collaboration, self-motivation, structure and analytical thinking, along with a strong drive to achieve performance goals.


Required skills:

* Master degree or Relevant University degree, or equivalent job experience
* Several years of relevant experience in Procurement of SW and IT areas
* Strong Business acumen and Commercial drive
* Significant experience of procuring Cloud and SaaS solutions
* Significant experience of software and IT market, suppliers, solutions and business models
* Excellent Swedish and English skills, verbal and written

  

Desired skills:

* Experience from Supply Chain
* Experience of leading commercial teams
* Interest in continuous improvements and digitalization
* Interest in sustainability

*This position requires that you pass a security vetting based on the current regulations around/of security protection. For positions requiring security clearance additional obligations on citizenship may apply.*


What you will be part of


Behind our innovations stand the people who make them possible. Brave pioneers and curious minds. Everyday heroes and inventive troubleshooters. Those who share deep knowledge and those who explore sky-high. And everyone in between.


Joining us means making an impact together, contributing in our own unique ways. From crafting complex code and building impressive defence and security solutions to simply sharing a coffee with a colleague, every action counts. We encourage you to take on challenges, to create smart inventions and grow in our friendly and tech-savvy workspace. We have a solid mission to keep people and society safe.


Saab is a leading defence and security company with an enduring mission, to help nations keep their people and society safe. Empowered by its 23,000 talented people, Saab constantly pushes the boundaries of technology to create a safer and more sustainable world.


Saab designs, manufactures and maintains advanced systems in aeronautics, weapons, command and control, sensors and underwater systems. Saab is headquartered in Sweden. It has major operations all over the world and is part of the domestic defence capability of several nations. Read more about us here


Kindly observe that this is an ongoing recruitment process and that the position might be filled before the closing date of the advertisement.
company_description: Saab serves the global market with world-leading products, services and solutions from military defense to civil security.

title: Gruppchef för teknisk förvaltning
description:
**Har du en passion för teknik och ledarskap? Vill du vara med och driva utvecklingen inom teknisk förvaltning på en av Sveriges mest framstående fackföreningar? Vi söker nu en Gruppchef för Teknisk Förvaltning som kommer leda en grupp bestående av tekniskt förvaltningsansvariga.**


Som Gruppchef för Teknisk Förvaltning på IT-enheten kommer du ha en central roll i att säkerställa effektiv drift och utveckling av våra tekniska system och processer. Du kommer leda ett team av engagerade specialister som arbetar med allt från IT-förvaltning och datasäkerhet till leverantörsstyrning och användarupplevelse. Tjänsten är placerad i Stockholm men du kommer även samarbeta nära ett flertal andra enheter för att optimera våra tekniska lösningar.

**Arbetsuppgifter**


Som Gruppchef för teknisk förvaltning leder och utvecklar du teamet av tekniskt förvaltningsansvariga genom att sätta tydliga mål och strategier. Du ansvarar för planering och genomförande av IT-förvaltningsstrategier med fokus på budget, uppföljning och resursallokering. Rollen innebär också att följa upp och ställa krav gentemot leverantörer samt stödja teamets arbete inom projekt- och ärendehantering, inklusive felsökning och problemlösning. Du deltar och leder projekt för att implementera nya tekniska lösningar som stärker verksamheten samt samarbetar nära interna och externa intressenter för att säkerställa att våra lösningar är säkra, effektiva och användarvänliga.

**Kvalifikationer**


Vi söker dig som har:

* Relevant akademisk utbildning inom IT eller motsvarande erfarenhet.
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet av att leda tekniska team, gärna inom IT-förvaltning eller relaterade områden.
* Förståelse för ITIL-processerna och erfarenhet av att arbeta med IT-support och ärendehantering.
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av projektledning och implementering av tekniska lösningar.
* Förmåga att kommunicera obehindrat på svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift.
* Vi ser även att du är en naturlig ledare med goda sociala färdigheter, hög flexibilitet och förmåga att motivera och engagera ditt team. Du är strategisk, problemlösningsorienterad och kan arbeta strukturerat även i stressiga situationer.

**Anställningsvillkor och förmåner**


Vi erbjuder en tillsvidareanställning på heltid med placering på Kommunals förbundskontor, Hagagatan 2, i centrala Stockholm. Tillträde sker enligt överenskommelse. Vi tillämpar individuell lönesättning. Kollektivavtal finns med Handels tjänstemannaklubb.


Kommunal arbetar aktivt för jämställdhet och mångfald i arbetslivet. Vi vill tillvarata de positiva effekter som en jämn könsfördelning och en ökad mångfald kan tillföra verksamheten. Vi förutsätter att du som söker delar Kommunals värderingar och inser värdet av fackligt arbete.


Det är viktigt för oss att du ska trivas och må bra på din arbetsplats. Som anställd på Kommunal erbjuder vi dig ett arbete med kunniga och engagerade kollegor i en trivsam miljö med möjlighet till utveckling i linje med ditt uppdrag. Det är en självklarhet för oss att du omfattas av ett bra kollektivavtal som bland annat innehåller tjänstepension och försäkringar, ett generöst friskvårdsbidrag och flexibla arbetstider.

**Kontakt**


Har du frågor kring tjänsten, kontakta Erik Ljunggren, 010-442 70 98. Facklig företrädare är Kerstin Ljungberg, Handels tjänstemannaklubb, 010-442 71 63.

**Ansökan**


Välkommen med din ansökan bestående av CV och personligt brev. I ditt personliga brev vill vi att du motiverar varför just du skulle passa för denna tjänst. Vi vill ha dina ansökningshandlingar på svenska. Sista ansökningsdag är 2024-11-15. Urval sker löpande. Ansök därför så snart som möjligt, eller tipsa en vän.


Vi undanber oss vänligt men bestämt kontakt från rekryteringsföretag gällande samarbeten.


  
### **Län:**


* Stockholm
### **Anställningstyp:**


Tillsvidareanställning


### **Anställningsgrad:**


Heltid


### **Arbetstider:**


Dag


### **Sista ansökningsdag:**


2024-11-15


### **Arbetsplats/placeringsort:**


Stockholm


### **Kontaktpersoner:**


**Erik Ljunggren, IT-chef**


tfn: +46 0104427098


**Kerstin Ljungberg, facklig företrädare**


tfn: +46 10 442 7163

  


### **Adress:**


Hagagatan 2 11348 Stockholm

title: Software Engineer inom 5G
description:
**Vill du vara med och utveckla mjukvara i teknikens absoluta framkant? På Combitech erbjuder vi tekniska utmaningar och ett meningsfullt arbete med målet att bygga ett mer motståndskraftigt och hållbart samhälle. Genom att kombinera vår solida erfarenhet och kunskap från försvars-, telekom- och industrisektorn säkerställer vi att verksamheter, samhällen och vårt totalförsvar står stadiga inför framtidens utmaningar. Vi erbjuder trygga anställningsvillkor och en inkluderande företagskultur. Välkommen till Combitech!**

**Din roll som mjukvaruutvecklare inom 5G**
-------------------------------------------


Som mjukvaruutvecklare hos oss på Combitech kommer du att arbeta inom affärsområdet Autonomy and Connectivity. I affärsområdet arbetar ca 180 personer i Göteborg med spännande uppdrag i olika branscher så som rymd, satellit, telekom, försvar, radarsystem, gruvindustri och fordon. Våra konsulter arbetar både in-house hos Combitech i agila utvecklingsteam och på plats hos våra kunder.


Vi söker nu mjukvaruutvecklare av komplexa inbyggda realtidssystem inom teknikområdet 5G. Du kommer att vara en del av ett agilt team som ansvarar för hela produktens utvecklingscykel, inklusive systemering, design och test av inbyggda mjukvarusystem Exempel på språk och verktyg vi använder är C, C++, Java, Matlab och Git.


Combitech tror på att förena konsultrollen med en rik fritid då vi är övertygade om att balans mellan arbete och fritid är nyckeln till välmående och framgång. Du kommer att utgå från Combitechs kontor på Lindholmen där ca. 300 personer arbetar.

**Vem är du?**
--------------


För att trivas i rollen som mjukvaruutvecklare på Combitech behöver du ha några års erfarenhet samt ett stort intresse för teknik. Du har en civil- eller högskoleingenjörsexamen med relevant inriktning. Uppdragen förutsätter goda kunskaper i engelska, både i tal och skrift, och det är meriterande om du behärskar svenska.  

  

Vi värdesätter dina personliga egenskaper och är lyhörda för dina intressen och karriärmål. Då vi arbetar i team är det viktigt att kunna kommunicera, be om hjälp och att kunna lära av andra, men även kunna lära ut. Som konsult är du ambassadör för Combitech hos våra kunder, därför sätter vi stor vikt vid din personlighet.

**Då tjänsten innebär arbete som kan omfattas av försvarssekretess krävs det att du genomför och godkänns i en säkerhetsprövning.**

**Urval sker löpande. Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!**

**Kom och gör skillnad**
------------------------


Vi tror att man gör ett bättre jobb om man kan fokusera på rätt saker, därför gör vi det lätt att kombinera jobbet med vardagen. Vi satsar på våra medarbetare, de utgör kärnan, hjärnan och hjärtat i vår verksamhet. Dessutom står vi på en stadig grund av högteknologi, forskning och anställningstrygghet med försvars- och säkerhetskoncernen Saab som ägare.


För oss handlar det om hållbarhet - vi vill bli branschens mest hållbara företag; och för att vara ett hållbart företag i en hållbar framtid behöver vi investera i våra medarbetare. För oss är din återhämtning, dina utvecklingsmöjligheter och din trygghet lika viktigt som företagets framgång - utan våra medarbetare står vi stilla.


På Combitech ingår vårt kompetensutvecklingsprogram Combitech GROW som en naturlig del i din anställning! Vi ger dig möjlighet att växa i en företagskultur som uppmuntrar till både personlig och professionell utveckling, samtidigt som du arbetar i spännande och givande uppdrag.

**Vill du veta mer om hur det är att arbeta hos oss? Kolla in** våra karriärsidor!


Rekryterande chef: Johanna Nilén +46 734465047

title: Incident manager till E-hälsomyndigheten
description:
Drivs du av att göra nytta och påverka på riktigt och vill kombinera din kompetens med ett samhällsengagemang och en vilja att skapa nytta för invånare, vård- och apotekspersonal?
  
  

Vill du vara med på vår resa och digitala transformation och stödja vår verksamhet inom en växande myndighet? Då kan det här vara en roll för dig.
  
  

Vi söker nu en incident manager för att säkerställa att E-hälsomyndigheten bibehåller snabb, effektiv och säker hantering vid allvarliga incidenter som kan påverka leveransen av våra samhällsviktiga tjänster.
  
  

Om tjänsten
  
  

I rollen som Incident Manager hos oss verkar du för att så snabbt som möjligt hantera och lösa allvarliga incidenter som uppstår i vår it-miljö. Du ansvarar för att upprätthålla och förbättra processer, rutiner och arbetssätt kopplat till incident och problem management i nära samarbete med andra intressenter i organisationen.
  
  

Du ingår i ett team som tillsammans schemalägger rollen som operativ incident manager under kontorstid och som styr, leder och koordinerar arbetet som krävs för att lösa en allvarlig incident. En viktig uppgift i incidenthanteringen är att upprätthålla tydlig kommunikation till så väl externa som interna intressenter. Vid behov stöttar du våra agila team i arbetet med lägre klassade incidenter.
  
  

Efter att en allvarlig incident är åtgärdad koordinerar du i rollen som Problem Manager arbetet med problemhantering som har till syfte att förhindra att incidenter uppstår igen.
  
  

E-hälsomyndigheten tillhandahåller samhällskritiska tjänster vilket innebär att funktionen för incidenthantering alltid är bemannad. Utanför kontorstid bemannas den med schemalagd beredskap.
  
  

När du blivit ”varm i kläderna” och lärt känna verksamheten så kan det vara så att rollen som Incident Manager går att kombinerat med ytterligare uppgifter och det finns goda möjligheter att själv vara med och forma det.
  
  

Om dig
  
  

Som person har du förmåga att behålla lugnet när det hettar till och du trivs i en roll där du får vara ett stöd för verksamheten. Du är beslutsam och har förmåga att göra korrekta avvägningar och prioriteringar. Ditt arbetssätt är strukturerat och lösningsorienterat. Du arbetar proaktivt, tar ansvar och driver ditt arbete självständigt. Du har god samarbetsförmåga och kan skapa goda relationer med hela IT-organisationen och andra intressenter. Vid rekryteringen lägger vi stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper, då de är avgörande för hur du kommer att trivas och lyckas i rollen.
  
  

**Vi söker dig som har:**  

några års erfarenhet i rollen som Incident Manager
  
erfarenhet att arbeta processorienterat enligt ITIL-ramverket
  
eftergymnasial utbildning inom IT eller genom arbete förvärvad motsvarande kunskap
  
god kunskap i svenska, både i tal och i skrift
  
  

**Det är meriterande för tjänsten om du har:**  

erfarenhet i rollen som Problem Manager
  
erfarenhet av att arbeta med agil produktutveckling
  
praktisk erfarenhet av att förvalta ett ITSM-system
  
erfarenhet av arbete inom statlig myndighet
  
Vad erbjuder vi?
  
  

Vi är en myndighet i tillväxt. E-hälsomyndigheten erbjuder dig att vara med och skapa samhällsnytta. Vi arbetar med stora transaktionskritiska system som påverkar samhället, till exempel e-recept och Läkemedelskollen.
  
  

Hos oss kommer du att omges av trevliga och kompetenta arbetskamrater, på en myndighet med ett flertal viktiga samhällsuppdrag.
  
  

På E-hälsomyndigheten har alla medarbetare förtroendearbetstid och möjlighet att arbeta delvis på distans. Läs mer om hur det är att jobba hos oss: Jobba hos oss
  
  

Är du intresserad?
  
  

**Frågor angående tjänsten besvaras av:**  

**Enhetschef Maria Idberg:** 010-106 07 68
  
**HR-specialist Charlotte Wikhagen:** 010-106 08 32,
  
  

**Fackliga representanter:**  

**Fabian Göransson, Saco:** 010-458 62 34
  
**Ingela Gångfeldt, ST:** 010-458 62 90.
  
  

Välkommen att skicka in din ansökan och cv via vårt rekryteringsverktyg senast den 22 november 2024. Ladda gärna upp examensbevis, betyg och intyg som är relevanta för tjänsten i samband med din ansökan.
  
  

Anställningen är tillsvidare med sex månaders provanställning. Tillträde snarast eller enligt överenskommelse. Placeringsort för anställningen är Kalmar eller Stockholm. Arbetet kan innebära tjänsteresor, främst mellan Kalmar och Stockholm.
  
  

En anställning hos oss kan innebära placering i säkerhetsklass. Därför kan vi komma att behöva genomföra en säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585). För en del arbetsuppgifter i säkerhetsklass krävs svenskt medborgarskap.
  
  

Om du har beslut om skyddade personuppgifter, kontakta den HR-specialist som finns namngiven i annonsen.
  
  

Om E-hälsomyndigheten
  
  

E-hälsomyndigheten driver utvecklingen av den nationella digitala infrastrukturen inom hälsa, vård och omsorg. Vi skapar förutsättningar för digitala tjänster och lösningar för privatpersoner och professioner inom hälso- och sjukvård, apotek och socialtjänst. Vi arbetar för att hälsodata ska bli tillgängliga i hela vårdkedjan, oavsett var individer får vård.
  
  

Hos oss arbetar cirka 400 medarbetare fördelat på två orter, Kalmar och Stockholm. Läs mer om oss på www.ehalsomyndigheten.se
  
  

Rekryteringen sköts av E-hälsomyndighetens HR-enhet och vi undanber oss säljsamtal från rekryteringsföretag och annonssäljare.

title: IT Deskside Support Analyst
description:
We’re looking for motivated, engaged people to help make everyone’s journeys better.
Open Position as IT Deskside Support Analyst  

Are you passionate about IT problem solving and have a strong sense of service? Do you thrive in a dynamic environment? If so, you might be the perfect fit for our Nordic IT Team and the position as IT Deskside Support Analyst at gategroup!
Main duties and Responsibilities  

The IT Deskside Support Analyst will be based at our gategourmet unit at Arlanda. You are responsible for providing 1st Line and 2nd Line IT technical support to the business as well as to support IT projects as needed. The purpose of the service is to resolve all IT support issues and service requests reported to gategroup's IT Service Desk and to handle all support cases and service requests, which need to be escalated to internal or external 3rd party support providers. Since the support covers all operations in Sweden, the position includes frequent trips to mainly our other Swedish units but also to other units in the region.
We are looking for a diligent, driven, passionate individual who is keen to make an immediate impact within a busy operational environment, in a world-leading company with operations in over 60 countries. You are largely self-motivated, you have an enthusiasm for IT support and you want to simplify everyday life for users. We believe that you are curious about new technology and are an easy learner.* Supporting and maintaining all deskside technologies
	+ Second line troubleshooting of IT incidents raised by colleagues through our Global Service Desk
	+ Managing and documenting daily workload using our IT Service Management tool
	+ Taking ownership of incidents/requests and collaborating with third parties until resolution
* Responsibility for IT hardware and inventory
	+ Managing stock control, ensuring appropriate levels of IT stock are held at the allocated locations
	+ Supporting deskside equipment relocation and provision onsite and between offices
	+ Handling the recycling of redundant IT hardware, following agreed disposal processes
* Frequently travelling between gategroup units in the region providing support, as and when required
* Playing a key role in the adoption and promotion of new technology
* Participating in major global projects and rollouts as well as acting project manager for local initiatives


Our ideal candidate  

We think that you identify yourself with IT and that you are professional in you approach and IT competences. You have a keen eye for service, even in challenging situations, handling pressure, and making quick decisions when necessary. Thriving in a dynamic environment, you quickly adapt to new conditions and challenges, remaining flexible and managing multiple tasks simultaneously without losing focus. We place great importance on both qualifications and personal attributes.
Professional Skills:* Experienced in IT device management on the enterprise level
* Experienced in PC, printer and associated hardware systems
* Experienced in modern Microsoft Office products, and miscellaneous software in the deskside environment
* Experienced in Active Directory, Intune and domain administration
* Knowledge of ITIL Service Management as well as ServiceNow is meritorious
* Strong analytical and trouble shooting skills
* Enthusiastic to learn, understand, and apply new technologies
* Experience of and ability to communicate and operate effectively, both with team and customer
* Self-motivated, tenacious and able to work with a degree of autonomy
* Possess or working towards Microsoft Certifications is meritorious

  

Communication and language skills:* Excellent written and verbal communication skills
* Fluent English skills are a must


Due to our location at Arlanda Airport we conduct security screenings for all potential employees. To pass the security screening, you will need to provide documentation of your last five years of employment or education, proof of a clean criminal record, and a valid ID card. We will provide more details on this process later. Enough with the formalities. We are interested in you and hope the feeling is mutual. If you're interested in continuing the conversation, please apply for the position.  

Information about the company  

Gategroup is a market-leading company with strong culinary roots providing superior culinary and retail services with continuing product innovation and advanced technology solutions. Headquartered in Zurich, Switzerland, gategroup employs over 41,000 people and operates in 200 locations across all continents. Gategourmet is producing, packaging, and delivering catering services to the airline and railway industries around the globe. In Sweden both gategourmet and gateretail have operations based in Arlanda, Kista, Landvetter, Sturup and Tibro. Working with us means being part of a dynamic work environment with significant opportunities to make an impact. For more information about gategourmet, visit www.gategroup.com.  

If you want to be part of a team that helps make travel and culinary memories, join us!
company_description: Gate Gourmet is the world's largest independent provider of catering and provisioning services for the airline industry.

title: Marginalen Bank Graduateprogram 2025 – Data & Analys
description:
*Vill du arbeta i en entreprenöriell organisation där dina idéer tas tillvara och där du kan göra verklig skillnad? Marginalen Bank skapar möjligheter för människor och företag att utvecklas genom att vi förenklar deras ekonomiska vardag. Det gör vi genom att lyssna på våra kunder och erbjuda okomplicerade och konkurrenskraftiga produkter och tjänster. Vår vision är att bidra till en bättre värld genom att skapa ekonomiskt försprång för människor som söker en bank och partner som inte bara tittar på siffror utan lika mycket på idéer och framtid. Marginalen är i ett spännande skede med flertalet innovationssatsningar och satsningar på ny teknik.*


**Om programmet**

  

Är du nyexaminerad eller har 1-2 års arbetslivserfarenhet inom IT, analys eller statistik och vill vara med och forma morgondagens finansbransch? Då är detta en möjlighet för just dig! Programmet pågår under ett år där praktiska utmaningar varvas med utbildande aktiviteter för att du ska kunna lära känna Marginalen och finansbranschen på bästa tänkbara sätt. Här får du en kickstart på ditt arbetsliv och en språngbräda för din framtida karriär.



Du jobbar på vårt huvudkontor i centrala Stockholm och som Graduate på Marginalen tillhör du en specifik funktion inom organisationen. Till din hjälp för att uppnå din fulla potential har du en mentor, handledare och en mängd fantastiska kollegor. Efter årets slut kan du välja att stanna i din funktion eller söka dig vidare inom Marginalen. Är du dedikerad i dina åtaganden, pålitlig, uthållig och lever våra värderingar lovar vi att göra allt vi kan för att du ska ha en lång och rolig karriär hos oss på Marginalen!



Som Graduate kommer du under året rotera inom ditt specialistområde där du får möjlighet att testa olika roller inom din funktion*.* Programmet kommer därför ge dig en god grund att stå på och en stor chans att fortsätta utveckla både dig själv och organisationen. Självklart ser vi gärna att du utmanar oss kring framtidens finansbransch och vad som bör vara vårt nästa fokusområde. Hos oss kan du påverka både branschens och din egen framtid, bara du sätter gränserna!


**Om rollen**



Som en del av Data & Analys-avdelningen på Marginalen Bank kommer du få möjlighet att utveckla dig inom affärsanalys och rapportutveckling. Du kommer att få arbeta med att förvandla data till insikter som bidrar till viktiga affärsbeslut och utveckla interaktiva rapporter och dashboards i Power BI, som hjälper olika avdelningar att förstå data på ett enkelt och visuellt sätt.



Dessutom finns möjligheten att utveckla sig inom datalagerutveckling för den som är intresserad av att skapa en stabil grund för bankens databehov. Här kan du både fördjupa din tekniska kompetens och bidra till att bygga och optimera bankens datalager för framtidens analyser och beslut.



Kunskaper inom molnplattformen Azure är meriterande. Om du har erfarenhet inom Azure kan man vara med och bygga framtida datalager i Azure cloud.


**Vem du är**



För att trivas som Graduate hos oss behöver du ha ett starkt inre driv och ta stort ansvar för dina åtaganden. Då du kommer ha många kontaktytor ser vi att du är kommunikativ, flexibel och har en hög samarbetsförmåga. Du tycker det är roligt att arbeta mot högt uppsatta mål och att drivs av att skapa resultat. Vi vill att du utmanar oss och att du alltid hittar nya vägar för att förbättra och utveckla samt är prestigelös i att lära dig nya saker. Du har en stark analytisk förmåga och är en förebild i organisationen genom din goda attityd, inställning och prestation.


**Kvalifikationer:**


* Ett intresse för finansbranschen och dess utveckling i framtiden
* En master eller magister-examen inom data- och systemvetenskap, datateknik eller informatik. En relevant bakgrund kan även inkludera utbildning inom data science, statistik, industriell ekonomi med inriktning mot dataanalys.
* Maximalt två år av arbetslivserfarenheter efter examen
* Meriterande erfarenheter såsom extrajobb, ideellt engagemang eller utbytesstudier
* Flytande i både svenska och engelska i såväl tal- som skriftspråk

  



Programmet startar i september 2025. Ansökan sker via Marginalen Banks karriärsida och sista ansökningsdag är 31 januari 2025. Vi behandlar enbart fullständiga ansökningar, innehållande CV, personligt brev samt betygsutdrag. Vid frågor och funderingar är du välkommen att kontakta oss på trainee@marginalen.se. Vi tar inte emot några ansökningar via e-mail. Tjänsten utgår från vårt huvudkontor i Stockholm, Sverige.
