title: Head of Security and IT Governance
description:
**About Us**
 Join the Tech leadership team at Lendo Group, focusing on building, running and protecting market leading comparison sites for financial products across Scandinavia. Become part of an open-minded, agile, and cross-functional company that loves to solve problems and innovate! At Lendo, everyone can have an impact. Our tech teams work closely with the business, directly contributing to continuously improving our customer experience and our product offerings.
   

  

**Position Overview**
 We’re looking for a visionary leader with a background in security, sourcing, or project management to head a small, focused team. In this role, you will ensure the security, reliability, and compliance of our technical operations, while managing key cloud and SaaS vendors. Your leadership will be essential in securing our infrastructure, scaling operations, and meeting regulatory standards.
   

  

 You will lead both our Security- and Sourcing Managers, taking full accountability for the security and availability of services delivered by external suppliers. This role spans all Lendo Group brands across Sweden, Norway, and Denmark, reporting directly to the CTO.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Join the Tech Leadership Team to drive strategic and operational improvements, balancing security, scalability, and business agility.
* Lead sourcing projects, manage contracts, and set policies for vendor management.
* Ensure cybersecurity and data privacy compliance, particularly GDPR, working closely with cross-functional teams.
* Standardize processes across markets, maintaining internal procedures that ensure efficiency and consistency.
* Develop and execute a security roadmap, identifying and mitigating risks while fostering a strong security culture across all business units.
* Oversee IT governance, with a focus on third-party risk, regulatory compliance (GDPR, DORA), and business alignment.
* Support the development of secure, innovative products, and track security metrics to enhance our security posture.

title: Cloud Specialist – AWS
description:
**Our client is looking for a network specialist building global cloud connectivity They want a network specialist who wants to work in the technical forefront and who has worked with the latest cloud technologies (AWS primarily). They continuously explore the latest technologies and develop cutting edge solutions and services for our great colleagues and customers. The team wants a new member with a passion for network and programming. If you bring with you a great sense of ownership towards driving continuous improvement across the complete life-cycle of our solutions then that member could be you. You will be a part of a team that embraces DevOps and collaborates in designing, implementing, operating and supporting our network services with focus on delivering high quality, secure and stable solutions.**

### **Requirements**


* Academic degree within Computer Science, Mathematics, Engineering or similar relevant experience.
* Relevant professional experience.
* Working experience in cloud environments (primarily AWS – others, like Google cloud or Azure, are nice to haves).
* Network connectivity in the cloud.
* IaC experience (for example using tools like Terraform).
* Experience from the whole development cycle (build -> deploy -> maintain).
* Programming experience (primarily Python, Go and shell scripting).
* Deep understanding of IT security and the tools & technology needed to implement them.
* Good knowledge of network services and concepts like DNS, VPC, TGW and Azure.
* Excellent English skills, in both speech and writing.

title: Fullstackuvecklare
description:
Vill du vara med och förbättra framtidens digitala tjänster för Skandias företagsportal? Nu söker ett av våra .NET team en erfaren utvecklare som kan vara med att bidra till framtidens företagande hos oss. Är du redo att ta nästa steg i din utveckling? Ta då chansen att sök denna roll!


**Att jobba som fullstackutvecklare**



Som fullstackutvecklare kommer du att arbeta med att vidareutveckla och förvalta Skandias företagsportal för våra företagskunder. Du bidrar till att förenkla administrationen av försäkringar och hanteringen av företagsmedarbetare genom att utveckla innovativa och användarvänliga lösningar. Rollen innebära att skapa effektiva digitala tjänster som är både säkra och lättanvända för våra företagskunder.



Teamet som du kommer vara en del av är samarbetsorienterade och jobbar mycket med mobbprogrammering för att dela kunskaper och kontinuerligt utvecklas tillsammans. Teamet består av åtta medarbetare varav fyra utvecklare, en mjukvaruarkitekt, en produktägare (PO) och en scrum master. Vi utgår från kontoret i Stockholm och Sundsvall. Vi använder oss av en hybridarbetsmodell vilket betyder arbete på kontoret varvat med hemmarbete. Portalen vi utvecklar i är skrivna i .NET Core där vi har separat presentations- och affärslogik mellan process-API:er och microwebbar.



Vår techstack består av C#, .NET (Core/Framework) i backend, Typescript/Javascript (React.js) och Webpack för frontendutveckling. Vi använder Azure DevOps, Octopus Deploy och Git för kontinuerlig integration och distribution. Enhetstester är en viktig del av vårt arbete, och vi använder MS Test, XUnit, jest och React Testing Library för att säkerställa kvaliteten i våra applikationer. Dessutom kommer du kunna få stöttning av GitHub copilot för att på ett mer effektivt sätt utveckla koden.


*Just nu letar vi flera utvecklare till olika team. Du hittar övriga annonser på vår karriärsida eller på LinkedIn.*


  
**Kvalifikationer**
-------------------


**För att lyckas i rollen**

Vi söker dig som har några års arbetserfarenhet av .NET utveckling. Du har arbetat med APIer och integrationer samt suttit med React.js eller liknadnde ramverk i frontend. Vidare behärskar du flytande svenska, i tal och skrift.


Erfarenhet från försäkrings- eller bankbranschen är extra meriterande för rollen. Likaså om du arbetat med AI verktyg för kodutveckling.


Som person är du en lagspelare som trivs med att arbeta i en dynamisk och ständigt utvecklande miljö. Du är nyfiken, ansvarstagande och har en stark vilja att fortsätta utvecklas både tekniskt och som en del av teamet.


**Vad händer nu?**

Vi jobbar med löpande urval så tveka inte att skicka in din ansökan redan idag. I ansökan kommer vi att ställa ett antal urvalsfrågor som ligger till grund för urvalet. För att göra rekryteringsprocessen så rättvis och objektiv som möjligt kommer det att ingå intervjuer, tester via Alva Labs, bakgrundskontroll samt digital referenstagning.



Om du har frågor kring rollen vänligen ta kontakt med rekryterande chef Carina Sundelius på carina.sundelius@skandia.se


Ifall du har frågor kopplat till vår rekryteringsprocessen vänligen ta kontakt med TA Partner Harald Brehmer på harald.brehmer@skandia.se #LI-HB



Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!


Vårdförsäkringar och hälsoförsäkring


Vår företagskultur styrs av engagemang


Balans i livet och ett bra friskvårdserbjudande


Förmånlig tjänstepension


Bidrar till att göra skillnad


Förmånlig ränta på bolån


Extra semesterdagar


3 flexibla lediga dagar varje år

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
Are you passionate about driving innovation and shaping the future of the automotive industry? Do you thrive in a fast-paced environment where technology, creativity, and teamwork come together to build cutting-edge solutions? ALTEN Sweden is looking for a **DevOps Engineer** with experience in the automotive sector to help us accelerate our journey into the future of mobility!  

The ALTEN Gothenburg office is home to a dynamic, highly skilled team of engineers and developers from all over the world who specialize in delivering tailored solutions across sectors like automotive, telecommunications, life sciences, and IT. Known for their collaborative spirit, the team combines deep technical expertise with a proactive, problem-solving approach, fostering an environment where creativity and efficiency meet to drive impactful results for clients. With a strong focus on professional development and a supportive culture, the Gothenburg team is dedicated to both individual growth and collective success, making it an exciting and empowering place to be a part of.

 **WHAT WE OFFER YOU**

* A supportive and inclusive workplace with a focus on personal and professional growth.
* Opportunities to expand your skill set with access to ALTEN’s global network of experts.
* Individual education budget.
* Work-life balance days: three extra days off per year.
* Collective agreement, Pension, insurances, and wellness grants.



**WHAT WILL YOU DO**

* Develop and enhance CI/CD pipelines, automating workflows and streamlining deployments for critical automotive applications.
* Design scalable, secure, and high-performance infrastructure solutions, leveraging cloud technologies
* Work closely with software development, operations, and testing teams to create highly available, fault-tolerant systems that support vehicle connectivity, autonomous driving, and other cutting-edge automotive technologies.
* Monitor and maintain system performance, ensuring robust security, high availability, and smooth operations across all environments.
* Drive innovation by bringing fresh ideas and DevOps best practices into the ever-evolving automotive landscape.

**WHO ARE YOU**  

We are looking for mid-senior level DevOps Engineers to join the team. You will play a key role in ensuring seamless integration between development and operations, creating efficient, scalable, and secure systems that fuel innovation in the automotive space. You’ll be part of an agile, cross-functional team that collaborates to design and maintain robust infrastructure, CI/CD pipelines, and cloud platforms that support cutting-edge automotive applications. We see that you have experience with the following:

* CI/CD
* Python
* Git /Gerrit
* Bash
* Jenkins
* Docker/Kubernetes
* Cloud experience AWS/Azure
* Experience in software development

**ABOUT ALTEN**  

ALTEN is one of Europe’s largest consulting companies within Engineering, IT and Life Sciences with over 54,000 employees in more than 30 countries. We’re a global actor with a local presence with 1400 committed colleagues in offices from Lund in the south to Skellefteå in the north. Our engineers carry out complex and highly technical projects throughout the product development chain of the most prestigious companies in sectors such as Automotive, Aerospace & Defense, Energy, Manufacturing, Public Sector and Life Sciences. For four years in a row, ALTEN has been named one of Sweden’s most attractive employers by Karriärföretagen, an award for employers that offer unique career and development opportunities.

 **Apply Today!**


  
Jobb detaljer
01/11/2024
Göteborg
Rekrytering Kontakt
ALTEN Sweden
recruitment@alten.se

title: Oracle Exadata Devops Engineer
description:
What makes Cognizant a unique place to work? The combination of rapid growth and an international and innovative environment! This is creating a lot of opportunities for people like YOU — people with an entrepreneurial spirit who want to make a difference in this world.


At Cognizant, together with your colleagues from all around the world, you will collaborate on creating solutions for the world's leading companies and help them become more flexible, more innovative, and successful. And this is your chance to be part of the success story: we are looking for an Oracle DevOps Engineer to join our DevOps team.


**About Cognizant EAS-Oracle**  

Cognizant is a highly respected and successful IT & business transformation partner for many distinguished organizations globally. We work with the world’s leading organizations to provide collaborative solutions to their business and IT challenges with innovative ideas. As Oracle solution practice (EAS-Oracle) our expertise in cloud and Oracle delivery empowers our customers with best-in-class service for digital transformation across 15 verticals including: banking and financial services, healthcare, retail, consumer goods and insurance.


**About the role**  

As part of a DevOps team you will be building, supporting, migrating, and automating the Oracle environment on Exadata Cloud at Customer (ExaCC). Products supported within that environment include Oracle databases, Oracle Enterprise Manager, Oracle Key Vault and ExaCC.


You will engineer the solution to build ExaCC platform to be compliant to regulatory requirements. You will be extensively working on Oracle Database migrations to ExaCC.  

A part of the workload will be developing the infrastructure as code to support CI/CD pipeline based on products such as Git, Jenkins, Ansible and Python.  

Your day-to-day activities will range from actual engineering the Database migrations and coding automation scripts to engineering new or adapted solutions for the customer. As part of the migration delivery team you will also be responsible for configuration of monitoring, maximum availability architecture (MAA) and support during and after the cutover window.
  

You will work closely together with other teams and the Product Owner.


**Our ideal candidate**


* You are an experienced Oracle database administrator with Exadata/ExaCC knowledge and like to work in a DevOps team in a complex environment
* You love challenges and are motivated to achieve the project objectivesm. You are a team player, but also a self-starter
* You see the big-picture but like to go in detail to solve complex integration issues
* Experience with DevOps, Scrum, Agile
* Extensive experience with Oracle Enterprise Manager, Oracle Enterprise Linux and virtualization
* Good knowledge of Oracle Cloud Infrastructure

**What you can expect**


* Become part of a the ‘flag ship’ success story - We go through enormous growth!
* Based in the Nordics – we have offices in Norway, Denmark and Sweden in an European and Global network
* Organization driven by technology – We have a tremendous technology backbone
* Open, ‘can do’ team spirit
* Environment where you can make your own ideas reality
* To work on various challenging clients and projects

We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, sex, gender, gender expression, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.
company_addresses: 500 Frank W. Burr Boulevard Teaneck, NJ 07666
company_description: Cognizant helps companies modernize technology, reimagine processes and transform experiences so they stay ahead in a fast-changing world.

title: Enterprise Architect (Value Stream Architect)
description:
**Job ID:** 260770


**Date posted:** 01/11/2024


**Who you are**  

  

In these days, technology and business goes hand in hand, regardless of the final business product. From customer facing to internal use, technology solutions are all around us and you find this fascinating. Because of this, you keep yourself updated on emerging technologies and information technology trends regularly and have a good knowledge and understanding of innovations in this space.  

  

Due to this interest of yours, you have many years of experience in leading the creation and refinement of value stream architecture blueprints, designs and patterns, aligning with the digital strategies. You inspire digital product and platform teams to develop new ideas, concepts, and strategical commitments as they design, build and deploy features and solutions.  

  

You know how to build solid business relationships through co-creation and you have developed good leadership skills with ability to collaborate and influence to promote a common purpose – creating customer value through digital possibilities. Sounds like you?  

  

Of course, you share and live our culture and values, and we believe you have:  

  

* Proven advanced training in information technology, computer science or equivalent.
* Minimum 8 years of experience from product and engineering organizations in a leading position (e. g. technology/enterprise architect) and minimum 5 years of experience in building & designing internet facing distributed systems
* An understanding of the Chinese IT landscape
* Proven enterprise architecture responsibility stretching across larger areas (value streams/domains) in a company with global stretch and worked with senior leadership
* Knowledge of Microsoft based technologies (Azure Cloud etc.)
* Demonstrable experience in working in an Agile and DevOps working set-up
* Knowledge across a range of different technology stacks, tools, ideally applied within a retail sector, and can change direction based on new ideas, approaches and strategies
* Demonstrable experience and knowledge of at least one architecture frameworks (e.g., TOGAF, Zachman)
* Experience in design and delivery of service-oriented architectures with modern development processes
* Extensive knowledge and experience of designing digital architecture blueprints
* Delivery experience of open source or cloud-based solutions
* Effective communication in English and interpersonal abilities

  

**What you'll be doing day to day**  

  

The responsibility of the Value Stream Architect is to develop and update the architecture landscape for a value stream. You will be a key contributor to the shaping of our Digital Roadmap and set the course with strategic direction, blueprints, principles, and standards. Based on this work, you will guide our Digital organization to implement end-to-end delivery of digital products and platforms.  

  

What you’ll do every day:  

  

* Evaluate enterprise digital products and vendor solutions for onboarding to the Digital landscape, establishing a technology roadmap that aligns with the organization.
* Promote implementation of the architecture roadmap according to plan, minimizing technical debt and maintaining a close feedback loop, while ensuring adherence to agreed architecture standards, principles, and the overall blueprint of the value stream.
* Ensure technology architecture designs and patterns account for non-functional requirements such as reliability, scalability, performance, and resilience, and translate business and information models into reliable and robust data architecture.
* Design and drive implementation of data security measures (including access controls, data encryption, and other strategies to protect data confidentiality, integrity, and availability) and the overall blueprint for how data is stored, managed, integrated, and accessed across the organization, adhering to data privacy regulations.
* Design and drive implementation of end-to-end data flows and processes for integrating data from various sources, utilizing Extract, Transform, and Load methodologies to ensure consistent and unified data across the organization.
* Monitor and optimize the performance of data storage and processing systems, identifying bottlenecks and implementing solutions to ensure efficient data access and retrieval.
* Support and organize teams following Agile and DevOps principles to implement, evolve, support, and own the software and system components to Digital quality standards, while contributing to building a digital mindset and an engineering culture that is accountability and results oriented.

  

You will report to Architecture Manager, Rahul Kumar, and your place of work will be Malmö, Sweden or Shanghai, China.  

  

**About this work area**  

  

Together with IKEA Retail and Investments, Ingka Centres is part of the Ingka Group.  

  

As a long-term partner of IKEA, we share our vision, our culture and our values, while what makes our businesses different is the way we fulfil our vision. We work hard to create a better everyday life outside of the home by developing virtual and physical meeting places where people can meet shop and connect with their communities.  

  

When people meet each other, incredible things can happen. Ideas sprout, new friendships begin and old friendships get a new start, collaborations produce results and even love blossoms. Ingka Centres provides spaces where this magic can happen. Our centres offer many reasons to visit – always anchored by IKEA and together with many inspiring partners, they attract many people, every day.  

  

Commercial and Digital (C&D) Domain enables Meeting Places, acting as a commercial engine to drive visitation and brand awareness through partnership and co-creation of innovative commercial and customer solutions, concepts and insights, creating an outstanding 360-degree experience for customers and communities’ solutions.  

  

**Questions and support? Let's connect!**  

  

Perhaps there is something you’re wondering about? For job specific questions please contact hiring manager Rahul Kumar at rahul.kumar8@ingka.com.  

  

Do you have questions about the recruitment process? Please contact Hektor Thomke at hektor.thomke@ingka.com  

  

We encourage you to apply as soon as possible, though no later than 2024-11-14.  

  

We look forward to receiving your application!
company_description: At IKEA, we share an inspiring vision: “to create a better everyday life for the many people”.

title: Technical Lead - Datacenters
description:
Job Description:

We are looking for a **Technical Lead, Datacenter - Secure Power Division** to join us on our journey to drive our further growth within an exciting business area in the Nordics and Baltics!

  

The position is based in our Swedish HQ in Frösundavik, we offer you a flexible hybrid working model.  

**What will you do?**  

You will be a driving force in the team where the main responsibility of this role is to capitalize on the in-depth knowledge of customer process, applications, and decision criteria within the segment with a special competence in datacenter electrical and mechanical infrastructure design. **You will be:*** Demonstrating expertise in data center electrical and mechanical infrastructure design, especially focusing on low voltage, UPS, cooling solutions, and heat absorption.
* Switchgear, Transformers, MV, and Busbars are clear advantages.
* Communicating internally and externally to influence customer technical decisions in favor of Schneider Electric.
* Providing technical support for data center projects and ensuring successful site integration.
* Collaborating with the Cloud and Service Providers segment to propose technical strategies for multi-business unit data center projects.
* Serving as a Subject Matter Expert for proposal questions related to data center electrical and mechanical infrastructure design.
* Supporting project managers with technical queries, installation, commissioning, and relevant documentation during project execution.
* Ensuring the execution team is capable of implementing the project's electrical and mechanical infrastructure design.
* Collecting lessons learned and providing feedback to the Line of Business/factory based on site information.
* Monitoring the competition, coordinating with suppliers, and updating project managers on progress.
* Providing technical expertise and support throughout the project lifecycle, including planning, execution, and commissioning.
* Supporting construction site management and ensuring compliance with safety requirements.

 **What will help you succeed?*** Suitable educational background such as technical degree (in example in Electrical or Mechanical Engineering)
* Solid previous professional experience in projects and services in relation to Datacenter electrical and mechanical infrastructure design applications
* Previous professional experience in secure power solutions, including medium and low voltage systems, protection devices, automation platforms, and power distribution automation functional descriptions are beneficial.
* Language skills in English and Swedish
* Understanding of how data center business works and how to influence the customer decisions.

**What do we offer you?**

  

As part of our team, you can expect:

* **Professional Growth**: Access to continuous learning opportunities, mentorship programs, and career development resources to nurture your potential and drive your career forward.
* **Innovative Environment**: Be part of a dynamic, forward-thinking organization that encourages creativity, innovation, and entrepreneurial spirit as we lead the way in digital transformation and sustainability.
* **Work-Life Balance:** We value your well-being and offer flexible work arrangements, comprehensive wellness programs, and support to help you maintain a healthy work-life balance.
* **Global Impact:** Contribute to meaningful projects that address global energy challenges and sustainability, making a positive impact on the world while advancing your career.
* **Inclusive Community:** Join a diverse and inclusive community where your unique perspectives are celebrated, and your voice is heard, fostering an environment of collaboration and belonging.

**Did we get you inspired?**

  

Please submit your application soonest. We will fill the position as soon as the suitable candidate has been found.

title: Sales Executive - Sweden
description:
Overview:

Candidates must have enterprise software sales experience that allows them to discuss both business and technology requirements with senior level decision makers. This position requires a solid technical understanding around the challenges companies face around managing their data as well as excellent commercial skills. You will be responsible for selling Quest’s data product portfolio across the Nordics. Applicants must be able to work in a collaborative sales environment aligned to a strong team of Business Development Representative and Technical Pre-Sales. This position forms part of the EMEA Sales Team, reporting to our Growth EMEA Sales Director.
Responsibilities:
* Selling Erwin by Quest solutions plus the complete Quest Data portfolio related to Data performance and migration in the allocated region
* Being able to develop a region quickly using their past experience and networks
* Creating and executing a territory plan as well as monitoring the progress
* Developing relationships with local partners to define a strategic action plan
* Understanding customers’ business and solutions requirements.
* Managing complex sales (large companies, multiple products across BUs)
* Territory/regional account management, including account planning and sales forecasting
* Executing a variety of sales and marketing activities
* Finding, developing and closing sales opportunities through a structured sales process
* Developing and maintaining strong business relationships
* Creating and executing targeted account plans
* Leading sales process and utilizes all available resources of BDR, technical pre-sales, and marketing


Qualifications:
* 10+ years’ experience in Enterprise Software sales
* Familiar with MEDDPICC and ready to use it a on daily basis
* Highly motivated and target driven with a proven track record in sales
* Excellent selling, negotiation and communication skills
* Prioritizing, time management and organizational skills
* Possessing effective negotiation skills
* Ability to create and deliver presentations tailored to the audience needs
* Relationship management skills and openness to feedback
* Able to provide direction and collaborate with partners
* Ability to develop long-term strategic and executive level relationships

 **Company Description**
At Quest, we create and manage the software that makes the benefits of new technology real. Companies turn to us to manage, modernize and secure their business, from on-prem to in-cloud, from the heart of the network to the vulnerable endpoints. From complex challenges like Active Directory management and Office 365 migration, to database and systems management, to redefining security, and hundreds of needs in between, we help you conquer your next challenge now.
We’re not the company that makes big promises. We’re the company that fulfills them.
We’re Quest: Where Next Meets Now. **Why work with us!*** Life at Quest means collaborating with dedicated professionals with a passion for technology.
* When we see something that could be improved, we get to work inventing the solution.
* Our people demonstrate our winning culture through positive and meaningful relationship.
* We invest in our people and offer a series of programs that enables them to pursue a career that fulfills their potential.
* Our team members’ health and wellness is our priority as well as rewarding them for their hard work.

  

Quest is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws, regulations and ordinances. *Come join us. For more information, visit us on the web at*Quest Careers | Where next meets now. Join Quest.*Job seekers should be aware of fraudulent job offers from online scammers and only apply to roles listed on quest.com/careers using our applicant system. Note: We do not use text messaging or third-party messaging apps like Telegram to communicate with applicants, so please exercise caution if you are approached in this way and only interact with people claiming to be Quest employees if they have an email address ending in @quest.com or @oneidentity.com*

title: Senior Test Engineer
description:
Senior Test Engineer


Swedium Global is the growing System Engineering and Solution Company, offers services like Semiconductor Engineering R&D Services, Embedded Systems Development, Custom Application Software Development, Web and Cloud Application Development, Testing Services, Consultancy and Outsourcing services to our clients across the globe for an onsite and offshore business model. Swedium Global is having presence in Sweden, Finland, Poland, Czech Republic and in India.


Location: Sweden


Expected Start date: ASAP


Job Name: Senior Test Engineer  

  

**Typical setup tasks:**


* Test run planning meeting
* Booking HIL rigs
* Creating test runs in Test Management System
* Exporting test cases from Test Management System
* Creating test cases branch in GIT.
* Configuring SW and flashing ECU.
* Verifying HIL environment is in a testable state.
* Test run follow up meetings.
* Starting test runs.
* Checking on progress.
* Restarting/debugging if test execution crashes.
* Getting all tests to execute.
* Typical post processing tasks.
* Uploading test results to Test Management System
* Analyzing tests not passed and classing them based on type of failure.
* **Rerunning test cases manually for further analysis and debugging.**

  

  

**Tools used:**


* In house tools for flashing and configuration of SW.
* Polarion for test case specification and test run result database.
* Jira for project and issue tracking
* GIT for version control of test cases.
* HIL rigs are ETAS based and models developed in Simulink.
* Vision/Inca for online calibration and data acquisition.
* Pycharm
* Python for test cases.


Pytest as test framework.  

Various batch scripts

  


You can reach out to us at Pratik.pandey@swediumglobal.com or hr@swediumglobal.com


  
Job Overview


* Location : Stockholm, Sweden
* Vacancy : 1
* Key Skills : HIL, Python, RIG, Automotive

title: Project Manager
description:
You may apply to Tietoevry by selecting Apply and fill your application details to the form. You may also Apply by using LinkedIn and populate details to your application from your LinkedIn profile.
Project Manager within e-Commerce - Tietoevry Create (m/f/d)
Are you interested in marketing and e-commerce with project management experience in a large organization? This opportunity may be for you!  

About the Role: We are seeking a member to join our Global PIM (Product Information Management) team, collaborating with one of our customers. The PIM team collaborates closely with the customer’s innovation and communication departments to create and maintain product information for all products sold to 40+ markets globally. You will manage standard project management tasks as well as content creation and evaluation. The refined information is stored in a PIM system and rolled out to various markets and channels such as brand sites, Amazon, and other e-Retailers.  

Key Responsibilities:* Main point of contact for all stakeholders in each product launch or update.
* Handle project scales from very small to large.
* Set up project timelines, communicate with stakeholders, and track progress.
* Ensure timely delivery of tasks by all involved parties.
* Lead meetings and manage stakeholders from diverse geographical locations.
* Provide feedback on content creation, both text and images.

  

Required Skills:* Several years in similar roles or as a project manager within digital marketing or e-commerce.
* People management skills: Lead project-related meetings with a diverse, global team.
* Attention to detail and creativity
* An ability to multitask
* Preferred Skills: Experience with PIM (Product Information Management) and DAM (Digital Asset Management) systems.

  

Additional Benefits:* Encouragement to develop and automate processes
* Leveraging Artificial Intelligence (AI) applications to advance PIM processes


Did we get you inspired?  

We look forward to your application! Please attach your CV or LinkedIn-profile and we will reach out to you. Interviews will be held continuously, so we encourage you to apply today. If you have any questions regarding this role, don't hesitate to get in touch with hiring manager Martin Korn, martin.korn@tietoevry.com
Hope to hear from you soon!  

Location: This position is based in both our office and our client's office in Gothenburg. Remote work is possible, but you must be on-site in Gothenburg at least 3 days per week. A key success factor for our delivery is a strong team that supports each other.  

We perform background checks on all final candidates.

title: Senior Specialist BMS Platforms
description:
**Job Description**

**Senior Specialist BMS Platforms**
===================================

**Salesforce Account Engagement & Marketing Cloud Specialist**

  

**Type of Employment:** Permanent

**Location:** Our offices in Sweden, Norway or Denmark

**Visa requirements:** A valid work permit from the EU/EEA (relocation assistance is not provided)

  

We're searching for a skilled Salesforce Account Engagement & Marketing Cloud Specialist to join our Global Salesforce team. If you're passionate about Salesforce & digital customer journeys, thrive in fast-paced environments, and love solving puzzles, then we want you on our team!


We offer a work environment full of creativity, independence, and supportive colleagues. If you're someone who thrives in such an environment, then you'll fit right in.

**WHAT YOU’LL DO**

* Manage the creation and maintenance of our customer journey flow.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand new requirements and align on prioritization.
* Provide expert-level support to users, troubleshoot issues, and offer timely resolutions
* Conduct training sessions for end-users and ensure ongoing system adoption.
* Identify opportunities for process improvement and efficiency within the Salesforce platform.
* Work closely with the commercial team to understand business requirements and translate them into Salesforce journey solutions.
* Lead and participate in Salesforce-related projects from initiation to completion.
**WHAT YOU’LL NEED**

**Personal skills:**

* Proactive, self-managed, and adaptable with a positive attitude in a fast-paced working environment.
* Eager to learn new things and develop skills.
* Team player, with strong relationship-building, interpersonal, and influencing skills.
* Excellent English oral and written communication skills – other languages are a plus.
* Interest in learning about business processes and systems.

**Functional skills:**

* Solid experience working within Marketing Cloud and/or Account Engagement
* Salesforce Certification in Marketing Cloud and/or Account Engagement
* Salesforce Administrator is a plus, but not required.
* Experience in Project Management or Project Teams.

**WHY WORK WITH US**


Wherever you are in your journey, we have a place for you. Here’s some of the exciting perks we offer:

* *Alimentation Couche-Tard* is a proud receiver Gallup Exceptional Workplace Award (GEWA) for 3 years in a row.
* Complete benefits packages (health insurance, pension contribution etc.).
* Possibility to enroll in stock purchase plan.
* Employee discount on fuel and in our stores.
* Paid time off plan including vacation, sick days and personal days.
* Work in a collaborative, dynamic, high performing and diverse team.
* Learning opportunities to develop new skills and to evolve professionally in a fast-growing company.
* Hybrid work to allow a sustainable work-life balance.


At Circle K, our culture is shaped by our team members and how we treat each other. You can find them at Values and Culture | Circle K. We hope they resonate with you and look forward to discussing them during your interview.

**INTERESTED?**


We encourage you to apply **November 15th****, 2024.** The candidates will be reviewed on continuous basis.


You don't meet all the necessary qualifications? At Circle K, we are fully committed to creating a diverse, inclusive, and genuine work environment. Therefore, if you're enthusiastic about this role but your background doesn't perfectly match every qualification, we encourage you to apply anyway. You may be just the right candidate for this or other roles.


If you have any questions about the job advertisement, please contact Anne Gronemann:


Email: agro@circlekeurope.com


Only applications received through our online system will be considered, not via e-mail.

**We are looking forward to your application!**

title: Engineering Manager Energy Optimization & Aggregation
description:
**Your leadership will make a difference.**

  


At Volvo Cars, we are always looking for world-class leaders who bring out the best in our people. If you want to be part of leading and inspiring our mission to change the automotive experience and make people’s lives less complicated, then we have the job for you.

  


**Where You’ll Belong**


Propulsion and Energy is one of the corner stones of Volvo Cars Engineering. We are at the **heart of electrification and energy engineering** with a clear purpose to develop state of the art propulsions and energy solutions.  

  

Energy management department is focusing on creating solutions for a great customer experience around energy and charging both in the car and beyond the car. A natural part of **Energy Solution**, our newly started business vertical.  

  

As Engineering Manager you will lead an engaged and growing team of software developers that are part of building the future of energy solution. You will belong to the Energy Management leadership team, working together with a team of experienced and motivated leaders. This role gives you a great opportunity to build your team and nurturing collaboration cross Volvo Cars while making a true difference for the organization.  



**What you’ll do**


You will lead and grow a team of talented software engineers providing them with mentorship, guidance, support and feedback. You will build competence and nurture talent by hiring and actively developing your team. You will ensure, through streamlined execution and experimentation, that our solutions meet the needs of our customers quickly and accurately. You will cultivate friendly and effective cross functional collaboration within Energy Solution.  

  

Moreover, you will advocate and strengthen a modern software development and help us develop and foster good engineering practices. You will ensure the solutions are scalable, sustainable, architecturally sound, and that technical debt is both incurred consciously and repaid in a reasonable time.  

  

Lastly, you will take the opportunity to collaborate with other engineering leaders across the organization, driving excellence and fostering a culture of continuous improvement.  

  

**What you’ll bring**


We are looking for you who is an engaged and inspiring people leader. You thrive from developing and growing an engineering team in a high paced and fast changing business and have previous experience of doing so. Applying creative thinking, never hesitate to think outside the box and use data to efficiently bring you forward comes naturally for you.  

  

You are a committed and collaborative colleague with the ability to create trust around you while influencing others. You have strong communication skills creating clarity and motivation for the teams around you. We also see that you have a good ability to listen and coach and you are energetic and truly motivated by creating new solutions together with the engaged teams.  

  

In addition to succeed you should have:  

* Strong experience from managing engineering teams, people management and leadership
* Tech understanding in cloud architecture – especially in API driven design
* Background in SW Engineering, preferably from working with backend teams, and knowledge of programming languages such as .Net and Java
* Knowledge about Energy optimization and aggregation and/or energy engineering development

**Ready to Take the Next Step?**
---------------------------------

  

  

Please submit your application through our career page. Due to GDPR regulations, we’re unable to store or consider applications from other platforms. Make sure to submit your application in English.

  


If you have any questions about the recruitment process, you are welcome to reach out to Recruiter John Rose at john.rose@volvocars.com.

  

  

Once your application is successfully submitted, you’ll receive a confirmation email. Applications are open until 20th of November, 2025. We’re excited to get to know you!

  


**Volvo Cars – driving change together**
----------------------------------------

  

  

Volvo Cars’ success is the result of a collaborative, diverse and inclusive working environment. Today, we’re one of the most well-known and respected car brands, with around 43,000 employees across the globe. At Volvo Cars, your career is designed around your skills and aspirations, so you can reach your fullest potential.


And it’s so exciting – we’re well on our way on our journey towards full electrification. We have five fully electric cars already on the market, and five more on the way. Our fully-electric and plug-in hybrid cars combined make up almost 50 per cent of our sales. So come and join us in shaping the future of mobility. There’s never been a more rewarding time to play your part in our inspiring and creative teams!

  


#LI-JR1

title: Systemingenjör inom miljötålighet till Saab Surveillance
description:
Tog du nyligen examen inom maskinteknik och vill arbeta imiljöer där gränserna för vad som är tekniskt möjligt hela tiden utmanas? Saab Surveillance söker nu en nyexaminerad ingenjör med intresse för krav, prov och försvar.Rollen är kopplad till ett talangprogram som ger dig den ultimata övergången mellan studier och arbetsliv
  
  

Att jobba som Systemingenjör inom miljötålighetpå Saab SurveillanceSom miljötålighetsingenjör på sektionen Sub System Engineering kommer du att ingå i ett Environmental Engineering team som arbetar med analyser, kravställning, definition av prov och verifiering avseende våra radarprodukters tålighet mot bland annat vibration, stötlast och klimat. Arbetet berör Surface d.v.s. radarprodukter på land såväl som de till sjöss.
  
Som Systemingenjör inom miljötålighet ingår du i ett medelstort team av seniora och kompetenta ingenjörer. Rollen innebär att tydliggöra och specificera krav för Saabs olika system och beskriva hur dessa ska verifieras. Du stödjer konstruktörer på olika nivåer i produktstrukturen genom att förmedla en klar bild av kraven, hur de kan uppfyllas och vilka verifieringsmetoder som ska användas. Dessutom bidrar du med din expertis till den långsiktiga utvecklingen av produkterna.
  
I arbetet ingår att hantera komplexa system, skapa optimala lösningar, och arbeta med den senaste tekniken inom ditt specialistområde. Du arbetar nära både hårdvaran och verifieringsutrustningen i olika testmiljöer och samarbetar med systemingenjörer, delsystemutvecklare, projektledare, verifieringsansvariga samt ingenjörer inom beräkning och analys. Rollen kräver både praktiskt och teoretiskt arbete, liksom analytiskt dokumentationsarbete, i en organisation där god kommunikation och helhetssyn värderas högt.
  
Vi söker dig somgillar att arbeta i team och att samarbeta med andra. Du är även trygg i att presentera och förklara tekniska lösningar för omgivningen. Att hantera nya utmaningar ser du som en naturlig del av jobbet och du väljer enkla och effektiva lösningar. Du är öppen för att prova på nya teknikområden och vill utvecklas både personligt och professionellt.
  
  

Rollen är placerad i Göteborg.
  
  

Att vara konsult på Nexer Tech Talent
  
Nexer Tech Talent är specialister på att ge unga techtalanger den ultimata starten på arbetslivet. För denna roll kommer du att bli anställd av Nexer Tech Talent men arbeta hos Saabmed start omgående efter godkänd säkerhetsprövning. Du kommer även att få ta del av ett skräddarsytt utbildningsprogram där du får möjlighet att utveckla och fördjupa dina tekniska kunskaper i områden som AI, Cloud och cybersäkerhet,men även inom tex. ledarskap och personlig utveckling.
  
Du kommer att coachas av en mentor hosSaabsamt en konsultchef på Nexer Tech Talent. Som konsult hos oss blir du väl omhändertagen och bjuds ofta in på gemensamma aktiviteter så som föreläsningar, afterwork och lunchträffar. Efter framgångsrikt genomförande av konsultuppdraget är intentionen att du erbjuds en anställning hos Saab.
  
  

**Vi söker dig som:**  

Är i början av din karriär och har encivil- eller högskoleingenjör inom maskinteknik, mekanik eller mekatronik.
  
Har ett intresse föranalyser, kravställning, definition av prov och verifiering.
  
Som person harpositiv inställning, är resultatorienterad och är en utpräglad lagspelare. Du har ett analytiskt förhållningssätt och att du är drivande i ditt arbete, tar eget initiativ och ansvar.
  
Har goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska.
  
Meriterande är attha erfarenhet av kravnedbrytning, test, verifiering, provning samt mekanikkonstruktion. C-körkort är även meriterande.
  
  

För företag inom försvars- och säkerhetsindustrin i Sverige, kräver lagen att anställda som hanterar känslig information och teknologi ska vara svenska medborgare samt genomgå en säkerhetsprövning.
  
  

Ansökan
  
Låter detta som något för dig? Vi arbetar löpande med rekryteringen, så skicka in din ansökan snarast möjligt. Om du har du frågor eller funderingar är du välkommen att kontakta Tech Recruiter Olivia Holm på olivia.holm@nexergroup.com.
  
Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!
  
  

Om Nexer Tech Talent
  
Nexer Tech Talent är en del av Nexer Group – ett techbolag med djupa rötter i svenskt entreprenörskap och innovation. Tillsammans är vi över 2500 medarbetare i 15 länder som i mer än 35 år hjälpt våra kunder att ligga steget före både strategiskt, teknologiskt och kommunikativt. Läs mer om Nexer Tech Talent här.

title: Testare till FMV
description:
Tog du nyligen examen inom och vill arbeta med test och säkerhet? FMV söker nu en nyexaminerad ingenjör med intresse för test, säkerhet och dokumentation.Rollen är kopplad till ett talangprogram som ger dig den ultimata övergången mellan studier och arbetsliv
  
  

Att jobba som testare på FMV
  
FMV, Försvarets materielverk, är en civil myndighet med specialistkompetens inom teknik, affärer och försvar. Myndigheten har som huvuduppgift att, i nära samarbete med Försvarsmakten, utveckla och anskaffa materiel och tjänster som stärker försvarets operativa förmåga. FMV upphandlar, utvecklar och levererar för att möta behoven inom det svenska försvaret i både freds- och krissituationer. Här arbetar specialister inom teknik, affärer, juridik och projektledning för att säkerställa att Försvarsmakten får rätt utrustning för sina uppdrag.
  
Materielen testas på FMVsegna provplatser för att säkerställa att den uppfyller tekniska krav, är säker att använda och har rätt prestanda. Detta arbete är avgörande för att Försvarsmakten ska kunna utföra sitt uppdrag på ett effektivt och säkert sätt.
  
Som testare på FMVkommer du att arbeta i anskaffningsprojekt som fokuserar på IT-säkerhetskrav och IT-arkitektur, och tillsammans med industrin granska deras tekniska lösningar.Dagarna präglas av nära samarbete med industrin och MUST. Du kommer att arbeta med externa system och testa både hårdvara och mjukvara, vilket kräver förståelse för komponenter som switchar, kryptonoder, dioder och skyddsmekanismer.
  
Rollen kräver självständighet och metodiskt arbete. Dokumentation och metod är en stor del av rollen. Vi söker enteamplayer med integritet, lojalitet, nyfikenhet och driv.
  
  

Rollen är placerad i Stockholm.
  
  

Att vara konsult på Nexer Tech Talent
  
Nexer Tech Talent är specialister på att ge unga techtalanger den ultimata starten på arbetslivet. För denna roll kommer du att bli anställd av Nexer Tech Talent men arbeta hos FMV i Stockholmmed start omgående. Du kommer även att få ta del av ett skräddarsytt utbildningsprogram där du får möjlighet att utveckla och fördjupa dina tekniska kunskaper i områden som AI, Cloud och cybersäkerhet,men även inom tex. ledarskap och personlig utveckling.
  
Du kommer att coachas av en mentor hosFMVsamt en konsultchef på Nexer Tech Talent. Som konsult hos oss blir du väl omhändertagen och bjuds ofta in på gemensamma aktiviteter så som föreläsningar, afterwork och lunchträffar. Efter framgångsrikt genomförande av konsultuppdraget är intentionen att du erbjuds en anställning hos FMV.
  
  

**Vi söker dig som:**  

Är i början av din karriär och har en ingenjörsutbildninginom data, maskin eller elektronik.
  
Har ett intresse för test, förståelse för mjukvara- och hårdvara samt dokumentation.
  
Som person är driven, strukturerad med ett högt säkerhetsmedvetande.Du harbred teknisk förståelse och intresse för att arbeta i försvaret.
  
Har mycket goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska.
  
Har mycket goda kunskaper iOfficepaketet.
  
  

För företag inom försvars- och säkerhetsindustrin i Sverige, kräver lagen att anställda som hanterar känslig information och teknologi ska vara svenska medborgare samt genomgå en säkerhetsprövning.
